lg.l: piṇḍē uggama uppāyaṇēsaṇā jōyaṇā pamāṇē ya
iṅgāla dhūma kāraṇa aṭṭhavihā piṇḍanijjutti
piṇḍa nikāya samūhē sampiṇḍaṇa piṇḍaṇā ya samavāē
samusaraṇa nicaya uvacaya caē ya jummē ya rāsī ya
piṇḍassa u nikkhēvō caukkaō chakkaō va kāyavvō
nikkhēvaṁ kāūṇaṁ parūvaṇā tassa kāyavvā
kulaē ya caubhāgassa sambhavō chakkaē cauṇhaṁ ca
niyamēṇa sambhavō atthi chakkagaṁ nikkhivē tamhā
nāmaṇṭhavaṇāpiṇḍō davvē khettē ya kāla bhāvē ya
ēsō khalu piṇḍassa u nikkhēvō chavvihō hōi
goṇṇaṁ samayakayaṁ vā jaṁ vāvi havejja tadubhaēṇa kayaṁ
taṁ binti nāmapiṇḍaṁ ṭhavaṇāpiṇḍaṁ aō vocchaṁ
guṇanipphannaṁ goṇṇaṁ taṁ cēva jahatthama satthavī benti
taṁ puṇa khavaṇō jalaṇō tavaṇō pavaṇō paīvō ya
piṇḍaṇa bahudavvāṇaṁ paḍivakkhēṇāvi jattha piṇḍakkhā
sō samayakaō piṇḍō jaha suttaṁ piṇḍapaḍiyāī
jassa puṇa piṇḍavāyaṭṭhayaṁ paviṭṭhassa hōi sampattī
guḍaōyaṇapiṇḍēhiṁ taṁ tadubhayapiṇḍamāhaṁsu
ubhayāirittamahavā annampi hu atthi lōiyaṁ nāma
attābhippāyakayaṁ jaha sīhagadēvadattāī
goṇṇasamayārittaṁ iṇamannaṁ vā'vi sūiyaṁ nāma
jaha piṇḍautti kīrai kassai nāmaṁ manūsassa
tullē'vi abhippāē samayapasiddhaṁ na giṇhaē lōō
jaṁ puṇa lōyapasiddhaṁ taṁ sāmaiyā uvacaranti
akkhē varāḍaē vā kaṭṭhē putthē va cittakammē vā
sabbhāvamasabbhāvē ṭhavaṇāpiṇḍaṁ viyāṇāhi
ikkō u asabbhāvē tiṇhaṁ ṭhavaṇā u hōi sabbhāvē
cittēsu asabbhāvē dārualeppōvalē siyarō
tivihō u davvapiṇḍō saccittō mīsaō acittō ya

ekkekkassa ya ettō nava nava bhēā u pattēyaṁ ।।
gāhā-16
puḍhavī āukkāō tēū vāū vaṇassaī cēva
bēindiya tēindiya caurō pañcendiyā cēva
puḍhavīkāō tivihō saccittō mīsaō ya accittō
saccittō puṇa duvihō nicchayavavahāraō cēva
nicchayaō saccittō puḍhavimahāpavvayāṇa bahumajjhē
accittamīsavajjō sēsō vavahārasaccittō
khīradumaheṭṭha panthē kaṭṭhōlē indhaṇē ya mīsō u
pōrisi ēga duga tigaṁ bahuindhaṇamajjhathōvē ya
sīuṇha-khāra-khattē aggī-lōṇūsa ambilē-nēhē
vukkantajōṇiēṇaṁ payōyaṇaṁ tēṇimaṁ hōi
avaraddhigavisabandhē lavaṇēṇa va surabhiuvalaēṇaṁ vā
accittassa u gahaṇaṁ paōyaṇaṁ tēṇimaṁ ca'nnaṁ
ṭhāṇanisiyaṇatuyaṭṭaṇa uccārāī cēva ussaggō
ghaṭṭagaḍagalagalēvō ēmāi paōyaṇaṁ bahuhā
āukkāō tivihō saccittō mīsaō ya accittō
saccittō puṇa duvihō nicchayavavahāraō cēva
ghanaudahī ghanavalayā karagasamuddaddahāṇa bahumajjhē
aha nicchayasaccittō vavahāranayassa aghaḍāī
usiṇōdagamanuvattē daṇḍē vāsē ya paḍiyamittaṁmi
mottūṇādēsatigaṁ cāulaudagē'bahu pasannaṁ
bhaṇḍagapāsavilaggā uttēḍā bubbuyā na saṁmanti
jā tāva mīsagaṁ tandulā ya rajjhanti jāva'nnē
ēē u anāēsā tinni vi kālaniyamassa'sambhavaō
lukkhēyara bhaṇḍaga pavaṇa sambhavāsambhavāīhiṁ
jāva na bahuppasannaṁ tā mīsaṁ ēsa ittha āēsō
hōi pamāṇamacittaṁ bahuppasannaṁ tu nāyavvaṁ
sīuṇha khārakhattē aggī lōṇūsa ambilē nēhē
vukkantajōṇiēṇaṁ paōyaṇaṁ tēṇimaṁ hōi
parisēyapiyaṇahatthāi dhōvaṇaṁ cīradhōvaṇaṁ cēva
āyamaṇa bhāṇadhuvaṇaṁ ēmāi paōyaṇaṁ bahuhā
uubaddha dhuvaṇa bāusa bambhavināsō aṭhāṇaṭhavaṇaṁ ca
sampāimavāuvahō pāvaṇa bhūōvaghāō ya
aibhāra cuḍaṇa paṇaē sīyalapāuraṇa'jīra gēlaṇṇē

ōhāvaṇa kāyavahō vāsāsu adhōvaṇē dōsā ।।
gāhā-33
appattecciya vāsē savvaṁ uvahiṁ dhuvanti jayaṇāē
asaīē u davassa ya jahannaō pāyanijjōgō
āyariyagilāṇāṇa ya mailā mailā puṇō'vi dhōvanti
mā hu gurūṇa avaṇṇō lōgaṁmi ajīraṇaṁ iyarē
pāyassa paḍōyārō dunisijja tipaṭṭa potti rayaharaṇaṁ
ēē u na vīsāmē jayaṇā saṅkāmaṇā dhuvaṇaṁ
pāyassa paḍōyārō pattagavajjō ya pāyanijjōgō
donni nisijjāō puṇa abbhintara bāhirā cēva
santhāruttaracōlagapaṭṭā tinni u havanti nāyavvā
muhapottiyatti pottī ēganisejjaṁ ca rayaharaṇaṁ
ēē u na vīsāmē paidinamuvaōgaō ya jayaṇāē
saṅkāmiūṇa dhōvanti vijja chappaiyā tattha vihiṇā u
jō puṇa vīsamijjai taṁ ēvaṁ vīyarāya-āṇāē
pattē dhōvaṇakālē uvahiṁ vīsāmaē sāhū
abbhintaraparibhōgaṁ uvariṁ pāuṇai nāidūrē ya
tinni ya tinni ya ēgaṁ nisiṁ tu kāuṁ paricchijjā
dhōvatthaṁ tinni dinā uvariṁ pāuṇai taha ya āsannaṁ
dhārēi tinni diyahē ēgadinaṁ uvari lambantaṁ
kēī ekkekkanisiṁ saṁvāsēuṁ tihā paricchanti
pāuṇai jai na lagganti chappaiyā tāhi dhōvanti
nivvōdagassa gahaṇaṁ kēī bhāṇēsu asui paḍisēhō
gihibhāyaṇēsu gahaṇaṁ ṭhiya vāsē mīsagaṁ chārō
gurupaccakkhāṇigilāṇa sēhamāīṇa dhōvaṇaṁ puvvaṁ
tō appaṇō puvvamahākaḍē ya iyarē duvē pacchā
acchōḍapiṭṭaṇāsu ya na dhuvē dhōē payāvaṇaṁ na karē
paribhōga aparibhōgē chāyāyava pēha kallāṇaṁ
tivihō tēukkāō saccittō mīsaō ya accittō
sacittō puṇa duvihō nicchaya vavahāraō cēva
iṭṭagapāgāīṇaṁ bahumajjhē vijjumāi nicchayaō
iṅgālāī iyarotti mummuramāī u missō u
ōyaṇavañjaṇapānaga āyāmusiṇōdagaṁ ca kummāsā
ḍagalagasarakkhasūī pippalamāī u uvaōgō
vāukkāō tivihō saccittō mīsaō ya accittō

sacittō puṇa duvihō nicchayavavahāraō cēva ।।
gāhā-50
savalaya ghanatanuvāyā aihima aiduddiṇē ya nicchayaō
vavahāra pāiṇāī akkantāī ya accittō
akkantadhantaghāṇē dēhānugaē ya pīliyāisu ya
accitta vāukāō va ēvavihō bhaṇiō kammaṭṭhamahaṇēhiṁ
hatthasayamēga gantā daiō accittu bīyaē mīsō
taiyaṁmi u sacittō vatthī puṇa pōrisidinēsu
niddhēyarō ya kālō ēgantisiṇiddhamajjhimajahannō
lukkhōvi hōi tivihō jahannamajjhō ya ukkōsō
ēgantasiṇiddhaṁmī pōrisimēgaṁ acēaṇō hōi
biiyāē saṁmīsō taiyāi sacēyaṇō vatthī
majjhimaniddhē dō pōrisīu accittu mīsaō taiē
cautthīē saccittō pavaṇō daiyāi majjhagaō
pōrisitigamaccittō niddhajahannaṁmi mīsaga cautthī
saccitta pañcamīē ēvaṁ lukkhē'vi dinavuḍḍhī
daiēṇa vatthiṇā vā paōyaṇaṁ hojja vāuṇā muṇiṇō
gēlannaṁmi va hojjā sacittamīsē pariharejjā
vaṇasaikāō tivihō saccittō mīsaō ya accittō
saccittō puṇa duvihō nicchayavavahāraō cēva
savvō'va'nantakāō saccittō hōi nicchayanayassa
vavahārassa ya sēsō mīsō pavvāyaroṭṭāī
pupphāṇaṁ pattāṇaṁ saraḍuphalāṇaṁ tahēva hariyāṇaṁ
veṇṭaṁmi milāṇaṁmi nāyavvaṁ jīvavippajaḍhaṁ
santhārapāyadaṇḍagakhōmiya kappā ya pīḍhaphalagāī
ōsahabhēsajjāṇi ya ēmāi paōyaṇaṁ bahuhā
biyatiyacaurō pañcandiyā ya tippabhii jattha u samenti
saṭṭhāṇē saṭṭhāṇē sō piṇḍō tēṇa kajjamiṇaṁ
bēindiyaparibhōgō akkhāṇa sasippasaṅkhamāīṇaṁ
tēindiyāṇa uddēhigādi jaṁ vā vaē vejjō
caurindiyāṇa macchiyaparihārō cēva āsamakkhiyā cēva
pañcendiyapiṇḍaṁmi u avvavahārī u nēraiyā
cammaṭṭhidantanaharōmasiṅga avilāichagaṇagōmuttē
khīradadhimāiyāṇa ya pañcindiyatiriyaparibhōgō
saccittē pavvāvaṇa panthuvaēsē ya bhikkhadāṇāī

sīsaṭṭhiga accittē mīsaṭṭhisarakkhapahapucchā ।।
gāhā-67
khamagāi kālakajjāiēsu pucchijja dēvayaṁ kañci
panthē subhāsubhē vā pucchēī divva uvaōgō
aha mīsaō ya piṇḍō ēēsiṁ ciya navaṇha piṇḍāṇaṁ
duga sañjōgāīō nāyavvō jāva caramotti
sōvīra gōrasāsava vēsaṇa bhēsajja nēha sāgaphalē
poggalalōṇa gulōyaṇa nēgā piṇḍā u sañjōgē
tinni u paēsasamayā ṭhāṇaṭṭhiiu daviē tayāēsā
caupañcamapiṇḍāṇaṁ jattha jayā tapparūvaṇayā
muttadaviēsu jujjai jai annonnāṇuvēhaō piṇḍō
muttivimuttēsuvi sō jujjai nanusaṅkhabāhullā
jaha tipaēsō khandhō tisuvi paēsēsu jō samōgāḍhō
avibhāgiṇa sambaddhō kahannu nēvaṁ tadādhārō?
ahavā cauṇha niyamā jōgavibhāgēṇa jujjaē piṇḍō
dōsu jahiyaṁ tu piṇḍō vaṇṇijjai kīraē vāvi
duvihō u bhāvapiṇḍō pasatthaō cēva appasatthō ya
ēēsiṁ dōṇhampiya pattēya parūvaṇaṁ vocchaṁ
ēgavihāidasavihō pasatthaō cēva appasatthō ya
sañjama vijjācaraṇē nāṇāditigaṁ ca tivihō u
nāṇaṁ daṁsaṇaṁ tava sañjamō ya vaya pañca chacca jāṇejjā
piṇḍēsaṇaṁ pāṇēsaṇaṁ uggahapaḍimā ya piṇḍaṁmi
pavayaṇamāyā nava bambhaguttiō taha ya samaṇadhammō ya
ēsa pasatthō piṇḍō bhaṇiō kammaṭṭhamahaṇēhiṁ
apasatthō ya asañjama annāṇaṁ avirai ya micchattaṁ
kōhāyāsavakāyā kammē'guttī a hammō ya
bajjhai ya jēṇa kammaṁ sō savvō hōi appasatthō u
muccai ya jēṇa sō uṇa pasatthaō navari vinnēō
daṁsaṇanāṇacarittāṇa pajjavā jē u jattiyā vā'vi
sō sō hōi tayakkhō pajjavapēyālaṇā piṇḍō
kammāṇa jēṇa bhāvēṇa appagaṁ ciṇai cikkaṇaṁ piṇḍaṁ
sō hōi bhāvapiṇḍō piṇḍayaē piṇḍaṇa jamhā
davvē accittēṇaṁ bhāvaṁmi vēya pasatthaēṇihaṁ pagayaṁ
uccāriyatthasarisā sīsamai vikōvaṇaṭṭhāē
āhārauvahisejjā pasatthapiṇḍassuvaggahaṁ kuṇai

āhārē ahigārō aṭṭhahiṁ ṭhāṇēhiṁ sō suddhō ।।
gāhā-84
nivvāṇaṁ khalu kajjaṁ nāṇāitigaṁ ca kāraṇaṁ tassa
nivvāṇakāraṇāṇaṁ ca kāraṇaṁ hōi āhārō
jaha kāraṇaṁ tu tantū paḍassa tēsiṁ ca honti pamhāiṁ
nāṇāitigassēvaṁ āhārō mokkhanēmassa
jaha kāraṇamanuvahayaṁ kajjaṁ sāhēi avikalaṁ niyamā
mokkhakkhamāṇi ēvaṁ nāṇāīṇi u avigalāiṁ
saṅkhēvapiṇḍiyatthō ēvaṁ piṇḍō maē samakkhāō
phuḍaviyaḍapāyaḍatthaṁ vocchāmi ēsaṇaṁ ettō
ēsaṇa gavēsaṇa maggaṇā ya uggōvaṇā ya boddhavvā
ēē u ēsaṇāē nāmā ēgaṭṭhiyā honti
nāmaṇṭhavaṇā daviē bhāvaṁmi ya ēsaṇā muṇēyavvā
davvē bhāvē ekkekkayā u tivihā muṇēyavvā
jammaṁ ēsai ēgō suyassa annō tamēsaē naṭṭhaṁ
sattuṁ ēsai annō paēṇa annō ya sē maccuṁ
ēmēva sēsaēsu vi cauppayāpaya acittamīsēsu
jā jattha jujjaē ēsaṇā u taṁ tattha jōejjā
bhāvēsaṇā u tivihā gavēsagahaṇēsaṇā u boddhavvā
gāsēsaṇā u kamasō pannattā vīyarāgēhiṁ
agaviṭṭhassa u gahaṇaṁ na hōi na ya agahiyassa paribhōgō
ēsaṇatigassa ēsā nāyavvā ānupuvvī u
nāmaṁ ṭhavaṇā daviē bhāvaṁmi gavēsaṇā muṇēyavvā
davvaṁmi kuraṅgagayā uggamauppāyaṇā bhāvē
jiyasattudēvicitta sabhapavisaṇaṁ kanagapiṭṭhapāsaṇayā
dōhaladubbalapucchā kahaṇaṁ āṇā ya purisāṇaṁ
sīvannisarisamōyagakaraṇaṁ sīvannirukkhaheṭṭhēsu
āgamana kuraṅgāṇaṁ pasattha apasattha uvamā u
viiamēyaṁ kuraṅgāṇaṁ jayā sīvanni sīyai
purāvi vāyā vāyantā na uṇaṁ puñjakapuñjakā
hatthiggahaṇaṁ gimhē arahaṭṭēhiṁ bharaṇaṁ ca sarasīṇaṁ
accudaēṇa nalavaṇā ahirūḍhā gayakulāgamanaṁ
viiyamēyaṁ gajakulāṇaṁ jayā rōhanti nalavaṇā
annayāvi jharanti jharā na ya ēvaṁ bahuōdagā
uggama uggōvaṇa maggaṇā ya ēgaṭṭhiyāi ēyāṇi

nāmaṁ ṭhavaṇā daviē bhāvaṁmi ya uggahō hōi ।।
gāhā-101
davvaṁmi laḍḍugāī bhāvē tivihoggamō muṇēyavvō
daṁsaṇanāṇacarittē cariuggamēṇettha ahigārō
jōisataṇōsahīṇaṁ mēhariṇakarāṇamuggamō davvē
sō puṇa jattō ya jayā jahā ya davvuggamō vaccō
vāsaharā anujattā atthāṇī jogga kiḍḍakālē ya
ghaḍagasarāvēsu kayā u mōgayā laḍḍugapiyassa
jogga ajiṇṇa māruya nisagga tisamuttha tō suisamutthō
āhāruggamacintā asuitti duhā malappabhavō
tassēvaṁ vēragguggamēṇa sammattanāṇacaraṇāṇaṁ
jugavaṁ kamuggamō vā kēvalanāṇuggamō jāō
daṁsaṇanāṇappabhavaṁ caraṇaṁ suddhēsu tēsu tassuddhī
caraṇēṇa kammasuddhī uggamasamuddhīi caraṇasuddhī
āhākammuddēsiya pūīkammē ya mīsajāē ya
ṭhavaṇā pāhuḍiyāē pāōara kīya pāmiccē
pariyaṭṭiē abhihaḍē ubbhinnē mālōhaḍē iya
acchijjē anisiṭṭhē ajjhōyaraē ya sōlasamē
āhākammiyanāmā ēgaṭṭhā kassa vāvi kiṁ vāvi ?
parapakkhē ya sapakkhē caurō gahaṇē ya āṇāī
āhā ahē ya kammē āyāhammē ya attakammē ya
paḍisēvaṇa paḍisuṇaṇā saṁvāsa'numōyaṇā cēva
dhanujuyakāyabharāṇaṁ kuḍumba-rajjadhuramāiyāṇaṁ ca
khandhāī hiyayaṁ miya davvāhā antaē dhaṇuṇō
ōrālasarīrāṇaṁ uddavaṇa tivāyaṇaṁ ca jassaṭṭhā
maṇamāhittā kīrai āhākammaṁ tayaṁ benti
ōrālaggahaṇēṇaṁ tirikkhamanuyā'havā suhumavajjā
uddavaṇaṁ puṇa jāṇasu aivāyavivajjiyaṁ pīḍaṁ
kāyavaimanō tinni u ahavā dēhāuindiyappāṇā
sāmittāvāyāṇē hōi tivāō ya karaṇēsu ya
hiyayaṁmi samāhēuṁ ēgamanēgaṁ ca gāhagaṁ jō u
vahanaṁ karēi dāyā kāyēṇa tamāhakammaṁ ti
jaṁ davvaṁ udagāisu chūḍhamahē vayai jaṁ ca bhārēṇaṁ
sīīē rajjuēṇa va ōyaraṇaṁ davva'hēkammaṁ
sañjamaṭhāṇāṇaṁ kaṇḍagāṇa lēsā-ṭhiī-visēsāṇaṁ

bhāvaṁ ahē karēī tamhā taṁ bhāva'hēkammaṁ ।।
gāhā-118
tatthānantā u carittapajjavā honti sañjamaṭṭhāṇaṁ
saṅkhaiyāṇi u tāṇi kaṇḍagaṁ hōi nāyavvaṁ
saṅkhāīyāṇi u kaṇḍagāṇi chaṭṭhāṇagaṁ viniddiṭṭhaṁ
chaṭṭhāṇā u asaṅkhā sañjamasēḍhī muṇēyavvā
kiṇhāiyā u lēsā ukkōsavisuddhiṭhiivisēsāō
ēēsi visuddhāṇaṁ appaṁ taggāhagō kuṇai
bhāvōvayāramāhēumappagē kiñcinūṇa caraṇaggō
āhākammaggāhī ahō ahō nēi appāṇaṁ
bandhai ahē bhavāū pakarēi ahōmuhāiṁ kammāiṁ
ghanakaraṇaṁ tivvēṇa u bhāvēṇa caō uvacaō ya
tēsi gurūṇamudaēṇa appagaṁ duggaīē pavaḍantaṁ
na caēi vidhārēuṁ aharagatiṁ ninti kammāiṁ
aṭṭhāē aṇaṭṭhāē chakkāyapamaddaṇaṁ tu jō kuṇai
aniyāē ya niyāē āyāhammaṁ tayaṁ benti
jāṇantu ajāṇantō tahēva niddisiya ōhaō vā'vi
jāṇagamajāṇagē vā vahēi aniyā niyā ēsā
davvāyā khalu kāyā bhāvāyā tinni nāṇamāīṇi
parapāṇapāḍaṇaraō caraṇāyaṁ appaṇō haṇai
nicchayanayassa caraṇāya vidhāē nāṇadaṁsaṇavahō'vi
vavahārassa u caraṇē hayaṁmi bhayaṇā u sēsāṇaṁ
davvaṁmi attakammaṁ jaṁ jō u mamāyaē tagaṁ davvaṁ
bhāvē asuhapariṇaō parakammaṁ attaṇō kuṇai
āhākammapariṇaō phāsuyamavi saṅkiliṭṭhapariṇāmō
āiyamāṇō bajjhai taṁ jāṇasu attakammanti
parakamma attakammīkarēi taṁ jō u giṇhiuṁ bhuñjē
tattha bhavē parakiriyā kahaṁ nu annatthaṁ saṅkamaī?
kūḍauvamāi kēī parappauttē'vi bentiṁ bandhotti
bhaṇai gurūvi pamattō bajjhai kūḍē adakkhō ya
ēmēva bhāvakūḍē bajjhai jō asubhabhāvapariṇāmō
tamhā u asubhabhāvō vajjēyavvō payattēṇaṁ
kāmaṁ sayaṁ na kuvvai jāṇantō puṇa tahāvi taggāhī
vaḍḍhēi tappasaṅgaṁ agiṇhamāṇō u vārēi
attīkarēi kammaṁ paḍisēvāīhiṁ taṁ puṇa imēhiṁ

tattha gurū āipayaṁ lahu lahu lahugā kamēṇiyarē ।।
gāhā-135
paḍisēvaṇamāīṇaṁ dārāṇa'numōyaṇā-vasāṇāṇaṁ
jahasambhavaṁ sarūvaṁ sōdāharaṇaṁ pavakkhāmi
annēṇāhākammaṁ uvanīyaṁ asai cōiō bhaṇai
parahatthēṇaṅgārē kaḍḍhantō jaha na ḍajjhai hu
ēvaṁ khu suddhō dōsō dentassa kūḍauvamāē
samayatthamajāṇantō mūḍhō paḍisēvaṇaṁ kuṇai
uvaōgaṁmi ya lābhaṁ kammaggāhissa cittarakkhaṭṭhā
ālōiē suladdhaṁ bhaṇai bhaṇantassa paḍisuṇaṇā
saṁvāsō u pasiddhō anumōyaṇa kammabhōyagapasaṁsā
ēēsimudāharaṇā ēē u kamēṇa nāyavvā
paḍisēvaṇāē tēṇā paḍisuṇaṇāē u rāyaputtō u
saṁvāsaṁmi ya pallī anumōyaṇa rāyaduṭṭhō ya
gōṇīharaṇa sabhūmī nēūṇaṁ gōṇiō pahē bhakkhē
nivvisayā parivēsaṇa ṭhiyāvi tē kūviyā ghatthē
jē'viya parivēsantī bhāyaṇāṇi dharanti ya
tē'vi bajjhanti tivvēṇakammuṇā kimu bhōiṇō?
sāmatthaṇa rāyasuē piivahaṇa sahāya taha ya tuṇhikkō
tiṇhampi hu paḍisuṇaṇā raṇṇā siṭṭhaṁmi sā natthi
bhuñja na bhuñjē bhuñjasu taiō tusiṇīu bhuñjaē paḍhamō
tiṇhampi hu paḍisuṇaṇā paḍisēhantassa sā natthi
āṇettubhuñjagā kammuṇā u bīyassa vāiō dōsō
taiyassa ya mānasiō tīhiṁ visuddhō cautthō u
paḍisēvaṇa paḍisuṇaṇā saṁvāsa'numōyaṇā u caurō vi
piyamāragarāyasuē vibhāsiyavvā jaijaṇē'vi
pallīvahaṁmi naṭṭhā cōrā vaṇiyā vayaṁ na cōratti
na palāṇā pāvakara tti kāuṁ rannā uvāladdhā
āhākaḍabhōīhiṁ sahavāsō taha ya tavvivajjampi
daṁsaṇagandha parikahā bhāvinti sulūhavittimpi
rāyōrōha'varāhē vibhūsiō ghāiō nayaramajjhē
dhannādhannatti kahā vahāvahō kappaḍiyakhōlā
sāuṁ pajjattaṁ āyarēṇa kālē riukkhamaṁ niddhaṁ
tagguṇavikatthaṇāē abhuñjamāṇē'vi aṇumannā
āhā ahē ya kammē āyāhammē ya attakammē ya

jaha vañjaṇanāṇattaṁ atthēṇa'vi pucchaē ēvaṁ ।।
gāhā-152
ēgaṭṭhā ēgavañjaṇa ēgaṭṭhā nāṇavañjaṇā cēva
nāṇaṭṭha ēgavañjaṇa nāṇaṭṭhā vañjaṇānāṇā
diṭṭhaṁ khīraṁ khīraṁ ēgaṭṭhaṁ ēgavañjaṇaṁ lōē
ēgaṭṭhaṁ bahunāmaṁ duddha paō pīlu khīraṁ ca
gōmahisiayākhīraṁ nāṇaṭṭhaṁ ēgavañjaṇaṁ lōē
ghaḍapaḍasagaḍarahāī hōi pihatthaṁ pihaṁnāmaṁ
āhākammāīṇaṁ hōi duruttāiṁ paḍhamabhaṅgō u
āhāhēkammanti ya biiō sakkinda iva bhaṅgō
āhākammantariyā asaṇāīṁ u caurō taiyabhaṅgō
āhākamma paḍuccā niyamā sunnō carimabhaṅgō
indatthaṁ jaha saddā purandarāī u nāivattantē
ahakamma āyahammā taha āhaṁ nāivattantē
āhākammēṇa ahē karēti jaṁ haṇai pāṇabhūyāiṁ
jaṁ taṁ āiyamāṇō parakammaṁ attaṇō kuṇai
kassatti pucchiyaṁmī niyamā sāhammiyassa taṁ hōi
sāhammiyassa tamhā kāyavva parūvaṇā vihiṇā
nāmaṁ ṭhavaṇā daviē khettē kālē ya pavayaṇē liṅgē
daṁsaṇa nāṇa carittē abhiggahē bhāvaṇāō ya
nāmaṁmi sarisanāmō ṭhavaṇāē kaṭṭhakammamāīyā
davvaṁmi jō u bhaviō sāhaṁmisarīragaṁ jaṁ ca
khettē samāṇadēvī kālaṁmi samāṇa kālasambhūō
pavayaṇi saṅghēgayarō liṅgē rayaharaṇa muhapottī
daṁsaṇa nāṇē caraṇē tiga paṇa paṇa tiviha hōi u carittē
davvāiō abhiggaha aha bhāvaṇamō aniccāī
jāvanta dēvadattā gihī va agihīva tēsi dāhāmi
nō kappaī gihīṇaṁ dāhanti visēsiyaṁ kappē
pāsaṇḍīsu na vi ēvaṁ mīsāmīsēsu hōi hu vibhāsā
samaṇēsu sañjayāṇa u visarisanāmāṇavi na kappē
nīsamanīsā va kaḍaṁ ṭhavaṇāsāhammiyaṁmi u vibhāsā
davvē mayataṇubhattaṁ na taṁ tu kucchā vivajjejjā
pāsaṇḍiyasamaṇāṇaṁ gihinigganthāṇaṁ cēva u vibhāsā
jaha nāmaṁmi tahēva ya khettē kālē ya nāyavvaṁ
dasa sasihāgā sāvaga pavayaṇasāhammiyā na liṅgēṇa

liṅgēṇa u sāhammī nō pavayaṇa niṇhagā savvē ।।
gāhā-169
visarisadaṁsaṇajuttā pavayaṇasāhammiyā na daṁsaṇaō
titthagarā pattēyā nō pavayaṇadaṁsa sāhammī
nāṇacarittā ēvaṁ nāyavvā honti pavayaṇēṇaṁ tu
pavayaṇaō sāhammī nābhiggahasāvagā jaiṇō
sāhamma'bhiggahēṇaṁ nō pavayaṇa niṇha tittha pattēyā
ēvaṁ pavayaṇabhāvaṇa ettō sēsāṇa vocchāmi
liṅgāīhivi ēvaṁ ekkekkēṇaṁ tu uvarimā nēyā
jē'nannē uvarillā tē mottuṁ sēsaē ēvaṁ
liṅgēṇa u sāhammī na daṁsaṇē vīsudaṁsi jainiṇhā
pattēyabuddha titthaṅkarā ya bīyaṁmi bhaṅgaṁmi
liṅgēṇa u nābhiggaha aṇabhiggaha vīsu'bhiggahā cēva
jaisāvaga biyabhaṅgē pattēyabuhā ya titthayarā
ēvaṁ liṅgēṇa bhāvaṇa daṁsaṇanāṇē ya paḍhamabhaṅgō u
jaisāvaga visunāṇī ēvaṁ ciya biiyabhaṅgō'vi
daṁsaṇacaraṇē paḍhamō sāvaga jaiṇō ya bīyabhaṅgō u
jaiṇō visarisadaṁsī daṁsē ya abhiggahē vocchaṁ
sāvaga jai vīsa'bhiggaha paḍhamō bīō ya bhāvanā cēvaṁ
nāṇēṇa'vi nejjēvaṁ ettō caraṇēṇa vocchāmi
jaiṇō vīsābhiggaha paḍhamō biya niṇhasāvagajaiṇō u
ēvaṁ tu bhāvaṇāsu'vi vocchaṁ dōṇhantimāṇittō
jaiṇō sāvaga niṇhava paḍhamē biiē ya hunti bhaṅgē ya
kēvalanāṇē titthaṅkarassa nō kappai kayaṁ tu
pattēyabuddha niṇhava uvāsaē kēvalī vi āsajja
khaiyāiē ya bhāvē paḍucca bhaṅgē u jōejjā
jattha u taiō bhaṅgō tattha na kappaṁ tu sēsaē bhayaṇā
titthaṅkarakēvaliṇō jaha kappaṁ nō ya sēsāṇaṁ
kiṁ taṁ āhākammanti pucchiē tassarūvakahaṇatthaṁ
sambhavapadarisaṇatthaṁ ca tassa asaṇāiyaṁ bhaṇai
sālīmāī avaḍē phalē ya suṇṭhāi sāimaṁ hōi
tassa kaḍaniṭṭhiyaṁmī suddhamasuddhē ya cattāri
koddavarālagagāmē vasahī ramaṇijja bhikkha sajjhāē
khettapaḍilēhasañjaya sāvayapucchujjuē kahaṇā
jujjai gaṇassa khettaṁ navari gurūṇaṁ tu natthi pāuggaṁ

sālitti kaē rumpaṇa paribhāyaṇa niyayagēhēsu ।।
gāhā-186
vōlintā tē va annē vā aḍantā tattha gōyaraṁ
suṇanti ēsaṇājuttā bālādijanasaṅkahā
ēē tē jēsimō raddhō sālikūrō gharē gharē
dinnō vā sēsayaṁ dēmi dēhi vā binti vā imaṁ
thakkē thakkāvaḍiyaṁ abhattaē sālibhattayaṁ jāyaṁ
majjha ya paissa maraṇaṁ diyarassa ya sē mayā bhajjā
cāulōdagampi sē dēhi sālīāyāmakañjiyaṁ
kimēyanti kayaṁ nāuṁ ? vajjanta'nnaṁ vayanti ya
lōṇāgaḍōdaē ēvaṁ khāṇittu mahurōdagaṁ
ḍhakkiēṇa'cchatē tāva jāva sāhutti āgayā
kakkaḍiya ambagā vā dāḍima dakkhā ya bīyapūrāī
khāima'higaraṇakaraṇanti sāimaṁ tigaḍugāīyaṁ
asaṇāīṇa cauṇhavi āmaṁ jaṁ sāhugahaṇapāuggaṁ
taṁ niṭṭhiyaṁ viyāṇasu uvakkhaḍaṁ tū kaḍaṁ hōi
kaṇḍiyatiguṇukkaṇḍā u niṭṭhiyā nēgaduguṇakaṇḍā u
niṭṭhiyakaḍō u kūrō āhākammaṁ duguṇamāhu
chāyampi vivajjantī kēī phalahēugāivuttassa
taṁ tu na jujjai jamhā phalampi kappaṁ biiyabhaṅgē
parapaccaiyā chāyā navi sā rukkhovvaṁ vaṭṭiyā kattā
naṭṭhacchāē u dumē kappai ēvaṁ bhaṇantassa
vaḍḍhai hāyai chāyā tacchikkaṁ pūiyampiva na kappē
na ya āhāya suvihiē nivvattayaī ravicchāyaṁ
aghanaghanacārigagaṇē chāyā naṭṭhā diyā puṇō hōi
kappai nirāyavē nāma āyavē taṁ vivajjēuṁ
tamhā na ēsa dōsō sambhavaī kammalakkhaṇavihūṇō
tampiya hu aighillā vajjēmāṇā adōsillā
parapakkhō u gihatthā samaṇā samaṇīu hōi u sapakkhō
phāsukaḍaṁ raddhaṁ vā niṭṭhiyamiyaraṁ kaḍaṁ savvaṁ
tassa kaḍaniṭṭhiyaṁmī annassa kaḍaṁmi niṭṭhiē tassa
caubhaṅgō ittha bhavē caramadugē hōi kappaṁ tu
caurō aikkama vaikkamō ya aiyāra taha anāyārō
niddarisaṇa cauṇhavi āhākammē nimantaṇayā
sālīghayagulagōrasa navēsu vallīphalēsu jāēsuṁ

dānē ahigamasaḍḍhē āhāya kaē nimantēi ।।
gāhā-203
āhākammaggahaṇē aikammāīsu vaṭṭaē causu
nēurahāriga hatthī cautiga dugaēga calaṇēṇaṁ
āhākammāmantaṇa paḍisuṇamāṇē aikkamō hōi
payabhēyāu vaikkama gahiē taiēyarō giliē
āṇāiṇō ya dōsā gahaṇē jaṁ bhaṇiyamaha imē tē u
āṇābhaṅga'ṇavatthā micchatta virāhaṇā cēva
āṇaṁ savvajiṇāṇaṁ giṇhantō taṁ aikkamai luddhō
āṇaṁ ca'ikkamantō kassāēsā kuṇai sēsaṁ ?
ekkēṇa kayamakajjaṁ karēi tappaccayā puṇō annō
sāyābahula parampara vocchēō sañjamatavāṇaṁ
jō jahavāyaṁ na kuṇaī micchaddiṭṭhī taō hu kō annō ?
vaḍḍhēi ya micchattaṁ parassa saṅkaṁ jaṇēmāṇō
vaḍḍhēi tappasaṅgaṁ gēhī ya parassa appaṇō cēva
sajiyampi bhinnadāḍhō na muyai niddhandhasō pacchā
khaddhē niddhē ya ruyā suttē hānī tigicchaṇē kāyā
paḍiyaragāṇavi hānī kuṇai kilēsaṁ kilissantō
jaha kammaṁ tu akappaṁ tacchikkaṁ vā'vi bhāyaṇaṭhiyaṁ vā
pariharaṇaṁ tassēva ya gahiyamadōsaṁ ca taha bhaṇai
abbhojjē gamaṇāi ya pucchā davvakuladēsa bhāvē ya
ēva jayantē chalaṇā diṭṭhantā tatthimē donni
jaha vantaṁ tu abhojjaṁ bhattaṁ jaiviya susakkayaṁ āsi
ēvamasañjamavamanē anēsaṇijjaṁ abhojjaṁ tu
majjārakhaiyamaṁsā maṁsāsitthi kuṇimaṁ suṇayavantaṁ
vannāi annamuppāiyanti kiṁ taṁ bhavē bhojjaṁ ?
kēī bhaṇanti pahiē aṭṭhāṇē maṁsapēsivōsiraṇaṁ
sambhāriya parivēsa vaṭṭaṇa vārēi suō karē dhettuṁ
avikālakarahīkhīraṁ lhasuṇa palaṇḍū surā ya gōmaṁsaṁ
vēyasamaēvi abhayaṁ kiñci abhojjaṁ apejjaṁ ca
vannāijuyāvi balī sapalalaphalasēharā asuinatthā
asuissa vippusēṇavi jaha chikkāō abhojjāō
ēmēva ujjhiyaṁmivi āhākammaṁmi akayaē kappē
hōi abhojjaṁ bhāṇē jattha vasuddhampi taṁ paḍiyaṁ
vantuccārasaricchaṁ kammaṁ sōumavi kōviō bhīō

pariharai sāvi ya duhā vihiavihīē ya pariharaṇā ।।
gāhā-220
sālīōaṇahatthaṁ daṭṭhuṁ bhaṇai avikōviō dentiṁ
kattoccautti sālī? vaṇi jāṇai puccha taṁ gantuṁ
gantūṇa āvaṇaṁ sō vāṇiyagaṁ pucchaē kaō sālī
paccantē magahāē gobbaragāmō tahiṁ vayai
kammāsaṅkāē pahaṁ mottuṁ kaṇṭāhisāvayā adisi
chāyampi vivajjantō ḍajjhai uṇhēṇa mucchāī
iya avihīparihārī nāṇāīṇaṁ na hōi ābhāgī
davvakuladēsabhāvē vihipariharaṇā imā tattha
ōyaṇasamiimasattuga kummāsāī u honti davvāiṁ
bahujanamappajanaṁ vā kulaṁ tu dēsō suraṭṭhāī
āyara'nāyara bhāvē sayaṁ va annēṇa vā'vi dāvaṇayā
ēēsiṁ tu payāṇaṁ caupaya tipayā va bhayaṇā u
anuciyadēsaṁ savvaṁ kulamappaṁ āyarō ya tō pucchā
bahuēvi natthi pucchā sadēsadaviē abhāvē'vi
tujjhaṭṭhāē kayamiṇamannonnamavekkhaē ya savilakkhaṁ
vajjanti gāḍharuṭṭhā kā bhē tattitti vā giṇhē
gūḍhāyārā na karenti āyaraṁ pucchiyāvi na kahenti
thōvanti va nō puṭṭhā taṁ ca asuddhaṁ kahaṁ tattha ?
āhākammapariṇaō phāsuyabhōīvi bandhaō hōi
suddhaṁ gavēsamāṇō āhākammēvi sō suddhō
saṅghuddiṭṭhaṁ sōuṁ ēi duyaṁ kōi bhōiē pattō
dinnanti dēhi majjhanti gāu sōuṁ taō laggō
māsiyapāraṇagaṭṭhā gamanaṁ āsannagāmagaṁ khamagē
saḍḍhī pāyasakaraṇaṁ kayāi ajjejjihī khamaō
khellagamallagalecchāriyāṇi ḍimbhaga nibhaccha ruṇṭaṇayā
handi samaṇatti pāyasa ghayagulajuya jāvaṇaṭṭhāē
ēgantamavakkamaṇaṁ jai sāhū ijja hojja tinnō mi
taṇukoṭṭhaṁmi amucchā bhuttaṁmi ya kēvalaṁ nāṇaṁ
candōdayaṁ ca sūrōdayaṁ ca rannō u donni ujjāṇā
tēsiṁ vivariyagamanē āṇākōvō taō daṇḍō
sūrōdayaṁ gacchamahaṁ pabhāē candōdayaṁ jantu taṇāihārā
duhā khī paccurasantikāuṁ rāyāvi candōdayamēva gacchē
pattaladumasālagayā dacchāmu nivaṅgaṇatti duccittā

ujjānapālaēhiṁ gahiyā ya hayā ya baddhā ya ।।
gāhā-237
sahasa paiṭṭhā diṭṭha iyarēhi nivaṅgaṇatti tō baddhā
nintassa ya avaraṇhē daṁsaṇamubhaō vahavisaggā
jaha tē daṁsaṇakaṅkhī apūriicchā vināsiyā raṇṇā
diṭṭhē'viyarē mukkā ēmēva ihaṁ samōyārō
āhākamma bhuñjai na paḍikkamaē ya tassa ṭhāṇassa
ēmēva aḍai bōḍō lukkavilukkō jaha kavōḍō
āhākammaddāraṁ bhaṇiyamiyāṇiṁ purā samuddiṭṭhaṁ
uddēsiyanti vocchaṁ samāsaō taṁ duhā hōi
ōhēṇa vibhāgēṇa ya ōhē ṭhappaṁ tu bārasa vibhāgē
uddiṭṭha kaḍē kammē ekkekki caukkaō bhēō
jīvāmu kahavi ōmē niyayaṁ bhikkhāvi kaivaī dēmō
handi hu natthi adinnaṁ bhujjai akayaṁ na ya phalēi
sā u avisēsiyaṁ ciya miyaṁmi bhattaṁmi taṇḍulē chuhai
pāsaṇḍīṇa gihīṇa va jō ēhii tassa bhikkhaṭṭhā
chaumatthōdhuddēsaṁ kahaṁ viyāṇāi? cōiē bhaṇai
uvauttō guru ēvaṁ gihatthasaddāiciṭṭhāē
dinnā u tāu pañcavi rēhāu karēi dēi va gaṇanti
dēha iō mā ya iō avaṇēha ya ettiyā bhikkhā
saddāiēsu sāhū mucchaṁ na karejja gōyaragaō ya
ēsaṇajuttō hojjā gōṇīvacchō gavattivva
ūsavamaṇḍaṇavaggā na pāṇiyaṁ vacchaē naviya cāriṁ
vaṇiyāgama avaraṇhē vacchagaraḍaṇaṁ kharaṇṭaṇayā
pañcavihavisayasokkhakkhaṇī vahū samahiyaṁ gihaṁ taṁ tu
na gaṇēi gōṇivacchō mucchiya gaḍhiō gavattaṁmi
gamanāgamanukkhēvē bhāsiya sōyāi indiyāuttō
ēsaṇamanēsaṇaṁ vā taha jāṇai tammaṇō samaṇō
mahaīē saṅkhaḍīē uvvariyaṁ kūravañjaṇāīyaṁ
pauraṁ daṭṭhūṇa gihī bhaṇai imaṁ dēhi puṇṇaṭṭhā
tattha vibhāguddēsiyamēvaṁ sambhavai puvvamuddiṭṭhaṁ
sīsagaṇahiyaṭṭhāē taṁ cēva vibhāgaō bhaṇai
uddēsiyaṁ samuddēsiyaṁ ca āēsiyaṁ samāēsaṁ
ēvaṁ kaḍē ya kammē ekkekki caukkaō bhēō
jāvantiyamuddēsaṁ pāsaṇḍīṇaṁ bhavē samuddēsaṁ

samaṇāṇaṁ āēsaṁ nigganthāṇaṁ samāēsaṁ ।।
gāhā-254
chinnamachinnaṁ duvihaṁ davvē khettē ya kāla bhāvē ya
nipphāiyanipphannaṁ nāyavvaṁ jaṁ jahiṁ kamai
bhattuvvariyaṁ khalu saṅkhaḍīē taddivasamannadivasē vā
antō bahiṁ ca savvaṁ savvadinaṁ dēhiṁ acchinnaṁ
dēhi imaṁ mā sēsaṁ antō bāhiragayaṁ va ēgayaraṁ
jāva amugatti vēlā amugaṁ vēlaṁ ca ārabbha
davvāī chinnampi hu jai bhaṇaī āraō'vi mā dēha
tō kappai chinnampi hu acchinnakaḍaṁ pariharanti
amugāṇanti va dijjau amukāṇaṁ matti ettha u vibhāsā
jattha jaīṇa visiṭṭhō niddēsō taṁ pariharijjā
sandissantaṁ jō suṇai kappaē tassa sēsaē ṭhavaṇā
saṅkaliya sāhaṇaṁ vā karenti asuē imā mērā
mā ēyaṁ dēhi imaṁ puṭṭhē siṭṭhaṁmi taṁ pariharanti
jaṁ dinnaṁ taṁ dinnaṁ mā sampai dēhi gēṇhanti
rasabhāyaṇahēuṁ vā mā kucchihiī suhaṁ va dāhāmi
dahimāī āyattaṁ karēi kūraṁ kaḍaṁ ēyaṁ
mā kāhanti avaṇṇaṁ parikaṭṭhaliyaṁ va dijjai suhaṁ tu
viyaḍēṇa phāṇiēṇa va niddhēṇa samaṁ tu vaṭṭanti
ēmēva ya kammaṁmi'vi uṇhavaṇē navari tattha nāṇattaṁ
tāviya vilīṇaēṇaṁ mōyaga cunnīpuṇakkaraṇaṁ
amuganti puṇō raddhaṁ dāhamakappaṁ tu āraō kappaṁ
khettē antō bāhiṁ kālē suivvaṁ parevvaṁ vā
jaṁ jaha va kayaṁ dāhaṁ taṁ kappai āraō tahā akayaṁ
kayapākamaṇiṭṭhanti ṭhiyampi jāvantiyaṁ mottuṁ
chakkāyaniranukampā jinapavayaṇabāhirā bahipphōḍā
ēvaṁ vayanti phōḍā lukkavilukkā jaha kavōḍā
pūīkammaṁ duvihaṁ davvē bhāvē ya hōi nāyavvaṁ
davvaṁmi chagaṇadhammiya bhāvaṁmi ya bāyaraṁ suhumaṁ
gandhāiguṇasamiḍhaṁ jaṁ davvaṁ asuigandhadavvajuyaṁ
pūitti pariharijjai taṁ jāṇasu davvapūitti
goṭṭhiniuttō dhammī sahāē āsannagoṭṭhibhattāē
samiyasuravallamīsaṁ ajinna sannā mahisipōhō
sañjāyalittabhattē goṭṭhigagandhotti cullavaṇiāyō

ukkhaṇiya annachagaṇēṇa limpaṇaṁ davvapūī ū ।।
gāhā-271
uggamakōḍīavayavamittēṇa vi mīsiyaṁ susuddhampi
suddhampi kuṇai caraṇaṁ pūiṁ taṁ bhāvaō pūī
āhākammuddēsiya mīsaṁ taha bāyarā ya pāhuḍiyā
pūī ajjhōyaraō uggamakōḍī bhavē ēsā
bāyara suhumaṁ bhāvē u pūiyaṁ suhumamuvari vocchāmi
uvagaraṇa bhattapāṇē duvihaṁ puṇa bāyaraṁ pūiṁ
cullukkhaliyā ḍōē davvīchūḍhē ya mīsagaṁ pūiṁ
ḍāē lōṇē hiṅgū saṅkāmaṇa phōḍaṇē dhūmē
sijjhantassuvayāraṁ dijjantassa va karēi jaṁ davvaṁ
taṁ uvakaraṇaṁ cullī ukkhā davvī ya ḍōyāī
culukkhā kammāī āimabhaṅgēsu tīsuvi akappaṁ
paḍikuṭṭhaṁ tatthatthaṁ annatthagayaṁ aṇunnāyaṁ
kammiyakaddamamissā cullī ukkhā ya phaḍḍagajuyā u
uvagaraṇapūimēyaṁ ḍōē daṇḍē va ēgayarē
davvīchūḍhetti jaṁ vuttaṁ kammadavvīē jaṁ daē
kammaṁ ghaṭṭiya suddhaṁ tu ghaṭṭaē hārapūiyaṁ
attaṭṭhiya āyāṇē ḍāyaṁ lōṇaṁ ca kamma hiṅguṁ vā
taṁ bhattapāṇapūī phōḍaṇa annaṁ va jaṁ chuhai
saṅkāmēuṁ kammaṁ siddhaṁ jaṅkiñci tattha chūḍhaṁ vā
aṅgāradhūmi thālī vēsaṇa heṭṭhā muṇīhi dhūmō
indhaṇadhūmēgandhē avayavamāīhiṁ suhumapūī u
sundaramēyaṁ pūī cōyaga bhaṇiē gurū bhaṇai
indhaṇadhūmēgandhē avayavamāī na pūiyaṁ hōi
jēsiṁ tu ēsa pūī sōhī navi vijjaē tēsiṁ
indhaṇa agaṇīavayava dhūmō bapphō ya annagandhō ya
savvaṁ phusanti lōyaṁ bhannai savvaṁ taō pūī
nanu suhumapūiyassā puvvuddiṭṭhassa'sambhavō ēvaṁ
indhaṇadhūmāīhiṁ tamhā pūitti siddhamiṇaṁ
cōyaga! indhaṇamāīhiṁ cauhivi suhumapūiyaṁ hōi
pannavaṇāmittamiyaṁ pariharaṇā natthi ēyassa
sajjhamasajjhaṁ kajjaṁ sajjhaṁ sāhijjaē na u asajjhaṁ
jō u asajjhaṁ sāhai kilissai na taṁ ca sāhēī
āhākammiyabhāyaṇa papphōḍaṇa kāu akayaē kappē

gahiyaṁ tu suhumapūī dhōvaṇamāīhiṁ pariharaṇā ।।
gāhā-288
dhōyampi nirāvayavaṁ na hōi āhacca kammagahaṇaṁmi
na ya addavvā u guṇā bhannaī suddhā kaō ēvaṁ?
lōēvi asuigandhā vipariṇayā dūraō na dūsanti
na ya māranti pariṇayā dūragāya avi visāvayavā
sēsēhi u davvēhiṁ jāvaiyaṁ phusai tattiyaṁ pūī
lēvēhi tihi u pūī kappai kappē kaē tiguṇē
indhaṇamāiṁ mottuṁ caurō sēsāṇi honti davvāiṁ
tēsiṁ puṇa parimāṇaṁ tayappamāṇāu ārabbha
paḍhamadivasaṁmi kammaṁ tinni u divasāṇi pūiyaṁ hōi
pūīsu tisu na kappai kappai taiō jayā kappō
samaṇakaḍāhākammaṁ samaṇāṇaṁ jaṁ kaḍēṇa mīsaṁ tu
āhāra uvahi vasahī savvaṁ taṁ pūiyaṁ hōi
saḍḍhassa thēvadivasēsu saṅkhaḍī āsi saṅghabhattaṁ vā
pucchittu niuṇapucchaṁ saṁlāvāō va'gārīṇaṁ
mīsajjāyaṁ jāvantiyaṁ ca pāsaṇḍisāhumīsaṁ ca
sahasantaraṁ na kappai kappai kappē kaē tiguṇē
duggāsē taṁ samaicchiuṁ va addhāṇasīsaē jattā
saḍḍhī bahubhikkhayarē mīsajjāyaṁ karē kōī
jāvantaṭṭhā siddhaṁ na ēi taṁ dēha kāmiyaṁ jaiṇaṁ
bahusu va apahuppantē bhaṇāi annampi randhēha
attaṭṭhā randhantē pāsaṇḍīṇampi biiyaō bhaṇai
nigganthaṭṭhā taiō attaṭṭhāē'vi randhantē sō hōi
visaghāiyapisiyāsī marai tamannōvi khāiuṁ marai
iya pāramparamaraṇē anumarai sahassasō jāva
ēvaṁ mīsajjāyaṁ caraṇappaṁ haṇai sāhu suvisuddhaṁ
tamhā taṁ nō kappai purisasahassantaragayampi
nicchōḍiē karīsēṇa vā'vi uvvaṭṭiē taō kappā
sukkhāvittā giṇhai anna cautthē asukkē'vi
saṭṭhāṇaparaṭṭhāṇē duvihaṁ ṭhaviyaṁ tu hōi nāyavvaṁ
khīrāi paramparaē hatthagaya gharantaraṁ jāva
cullī uvacullī vā ṭhāṇasaṭhāṇaṁ tu bhāyaṇaṁ piḍharē
saṭṭhāṇaṭṭhāṇaṁmi ya bhāyaṇaṭṭhāṇē ya caubhaṅgō
chabbagavāragamāī hōi paraṭṭhāṇamō va'nēgavihaṁ

saṭṭhāṇē piḍharē chabbagē ya ēmēva dūrē ya ।।
gāhā-305
ekkekkaṁ taṁ duvihaṁ anantaraṁ paramparē ya nāyavvaṁ
avikāri kayaṁ davvaṁ taṁ cēva anantaraṁ hōi
ucchukkhīrāīyaṁ vigāri avigāri ghayagulāīyaṁ
pariyāvajjaṇadōsā ōyaṇadahimāīyaṁ vā'vi
ubbhaṭṭha parinnāyaṁ annaṁ laddhaṁ paōyaṇē ghecchī
riṇabhīyā va agārī dahitti dāhaṁ suē ṭhavaṇā
navanīya manthutakkaṁ va jāva attaṭṭhiyā va giṇhanti
dēsūṇā jāva ghayaṁ kusaṇampiya jattiyaṁ kālaṁ
rasakakkabapiṇḍagulā macchaṇḍiya khaṇḍa sakkarāṇaṁ ca
hōi paramparaṭhavaṇā annattha va jujjaē jattha
bhikkhaggāhī ēgattha kuṇai biiō u dōsu uvaōgaṁ
tēna paraṁ ukkhittā pāhuḍiyā hōi ṭhavaṇā u
pāhuḍiyāvi hu duvihā bāyara suhumā ya hōi nāyavvā
ōsakkaṇamussakkaṇa kabbaṭṭhīē samōsaraṇō
kantāmi tāva pēluṁ tō tē dāhāmi putta! mā rōva
taṁ jai suṇēi sāhū na gacchaē tattha ārambhō
annaṭṭha uṭṭhiyā bā tubbhavi dāhāmi kimpi pariharati
kiha dāṇi na uṭṭhihisī? sāhupabhāvēṇa labbhāmō
mā tāva jhaṅkha puttaya! parivāḍīē ihēhi sō sāhū
ēyassa uṭṭhiyā tē dāhaṁ sōuṁ vivajjēi
aṅguliyāē ghettuṁ kaḍḍhai kappaṭṭhaō gharaṁ tēṇaṁ
kinti kahiē na gacchai pāhuḍiyā ēsa suhumā u
puttassa vivāhadiṇaṁ ōsaraṇē aicchiē muṇiya saḍḍhā
ōsakkantō saraṇē saṅkhaḍipāhēṇaga davaṭṭhā
appattaṁmi ya ṭhaviyaṁ ōsaraṇē hōhiitti ussakaṇaṁ
taṁ pāgaḍamiyaraṁ vā karēi ujjū anujjū vā
maṅgalahēuṁ punnaṭṭhayā va ōsakkiyaṁ duhā pagayaṁ
ussakkiyampi kinti ya puṭṭhē siṭṭhē vivajjanti
pāhuḍibhattaṁ bhuñjaiṁ na paḍikkamaē ya tassa ṭhāṇassa
ēmēva aḍai bōḍō lukkavilukkō jaha kavōḍō
lōyaviraluttamaṅgaṁ tavōkisaṁ jallakhauriyasarīraṁ
jugamettantaradiṭṭhiṁ aturiyacavalaṁ sagihamintaṁ
daṭṭhūṇa ya tamanagāraṁ saḍḍhī saṁvēgamāgayā kāī

vipula'nnapāṇa ghettūṇa niggayā niggaō sō'vi ।।
gāhā-322
nīyaduvāraṁmi gharē na sujjhaī ēsaṇattikāūṇaṁ
nīhaṁmiē agārī acchai viliyā va'gahiēṇaṁ
caraṇakaraṇālasaṁmī annaṁmi ya āgaē gahiya pucchā
ihalōgaṁ paralōgaṁ kahēi caiuṁ imaṁ lōgaṁ
nīyaduvāraṁmi gharē bhikkhaṁ nicchanti ēsaṇāsamiyā
jaṁ pucchasi majjha kahaṁ kappai? liṅgōvajīvī'haṁ
sāhuguṇēsaṇakahaṇaṁ āuṭṭā tassa tippai tahēva
kukkuḍi caranti ēē vayaṁ tu cinnavvayā bīō
pāōkaraṇaṁ duvihaṁ pāgaḍakaraṇaṁ pagāsakaraṇaṁ ca
pāgaḍa saṅkāmaṇa kuḍḍadārapāē ya chinnē va
rayaṇapaīvē jōī na kappai pagāsaṇā suvihiyāṇaṁ
attaṭṭhiya paribhottuṁ kappai kappē akāūṇaṁ
sañcārimā ya cullī bahiṁ va cullī purā kayā tēsiṁ
tahi randhanti kayāī uvahī pūī ya pāō ya
necchaha tamisaṁmi taō bāhiracullīē sāhu siddhaṇṇē
iya sōuṁ pariharaē puṭṭhē siṭṭhaṁmivi tahēva
macchiyadhammā antō bāhi pavāyaṁ pagāsamāsannaṁ
iya attaṭṭhiya gahaṇaṁ pāgaḍakaraṇē vibhāsā u
kuḍḍassa kuṇai chiḍḍaṁ dāraṁ vaḍḍhēi kuṇai annaṁ vā
avaṇēi chāyaṇaṁ vā ṭhāvai rayaṇaṁ va dippantaṁ
jōi paivaṁ kuṇai va tahēva kahaṇaṁ tu puṭṭhē'puṭṭhēvā
attaṭṭhiē u gahaṇaṁ jōi paīvē u vajjēi
pāgaḍapayāsakaraṇē kayaṁmi sahasā va ahava'nābhōgā
gahiyaṁ vigiñciūṇaṁ gēṇhai annaṁ akayakappē
kīyagaḍampiya duvihaṁ davvē bhāvē ya duvihamekkekkaṁ
āyakiyaṁ ca parakiyaṁ paradavvaṁ tiviha'cittāi
āyakiyaṁ puṇa duvihaṁ davvē bhāvē ya davva cuṇṇāī
bhāvaṁmi parassa'ṭṭhā ahavāvī appaṇā cēva
nimmallagandhaguliyā vannayapottāi āyakaya davvē
gēlannē uḍḍāhō pauṇē caḍugāri ahigaraṇaṁ
vaiyāi maṅkhamāī parabhāvakayaṁ tu sañjayaṭṭhāē
uppāyaṇā nimantaṇa kīḍagaḍa abhihaḍē ṭhaviē
sāgāri maṅkha chandaṇa paḍisēhō puccha bahu gaē vāsē

kayariṁ disiṁ gamissaha? amuiṁ tahiṁ santhavaṁ kuṇai ।।
gāhā-339
dijjantē paḍisēhō kajjē ghecchaṁ nimantaṇaṁ jaiṇaṁ
puvvagaya āgaēsuṁ sañchuhaī ēgagēhaṁmi
dhammakaha vāya khamaṇaṁ nimitta āyāvaṇē suyaṭṭhāṇaṁ
jāī kula gaṇa kammē sippaṁmi ya bhāvakīyaṁ tu
dhammakahāakkhittē dhammakahāuṭṭhiyāṇa vā giṇhē
kaḍḍhaṁ ti sāhavō ciya tumaṁ va kahi ? pucchiē tusiṇī
kiṁ vā kahijja chārā dagasōyariyā va ahava'gāratthā
kiṁ chagalagagalavalayā muṇḍakuḍumbī va kiṁ kahaē?
ēmēva vāi khamaē nimittamāyāvagaṁmi ya vibhāsā
suyaṭhāṇaṁ gaṇimāī ahavā vāṇāyariyamāī
pāmiccampiya duvihaṁ lōiya lōguttaraṁ samāsēṇa
lōiya sajjhilagāī lōguttara vatthamāīsu
suyaabhigamanāya vihī bahi pucchā ēga jīvai sasā tē
pavisaṇa pāga nivāraṇa ucchindaṇa tella jaidāṇaṁ
aparimiyanēhavuḍḍhī dāsattaṁ sō ya āgaō pucchā
dāsattakahaṇa mā ruya acirā mōēmi ettāhē
bhikkha dagasamārambhē kahaṇāuṭṭō kahiṁ ti vasahitti
saṁvēyā āharaṇaṁ visajja kahaṇā kaivayā u
ēē cēva ya dōsā savisēsayarā u vatthapāēsuṁ
lōiyapāmiccēsuṁ lōguttariyā imē annē
mailiya phāliya khōmiya hiya naṭṭhē vā'vi anna maggantē
avi sundarē vi dinnē dukkararōī kalahamāī
uccattāē dānaṁ dullabha khaggūḍa alasa pāmiccē
tampiya gurussagāsē ṭhavēi sō dēha mā kalahō
pariyaṭṭiyampi duvihaṁ lōiya lōguttaraṁ samāsēṇaṁ
ekkekkampiya duvihaṁ taddavvē annadavvē ya
avaroppasajjhilagā sañjuttā dōvi annamannēṇaṁ
poggaliya sañjayaṭṭhā pariyaṭṭaṇa saṅkhaḍē bōhī
anukampa bhaginigēhē daridda pariyaṭṭaṇā ya kūrassa
pucchā koddavakūrē macchara nāikkha pantāvē
iyarō'viya pantāvē nisi ōsaviyāṇa tēsi dikkhā ya
tamhā u na ghētavvaṁ kai vā jē ōsamēhinti ?
ūṇahiya dubbalaṁ vā khara guru chinnaṁ maila asīyasahaṁ

duvvannaṁ vā nāuṁ vipariṇamē annabhaṇiō vā ।।
gāhā-356
ēgassa māṇajuttaṁ na u biiē ēvamāikajjēsu
gurupāmūlē ṭhavaṇaṁ sō dalayai annahā kalahō
āinnamaṇāinnaṁ nisihābhihaḍaṁ ca nōnisīhaṁ ca
nisihābhihaḍaṁ ṭhappaṁ vocchāmī nōnisīhaṁ tu
saggāma paraggāmē sadēsa paradēsamēva boddhavvaṁ
duvihaṁ tu paraggāmē jalathala nāvōḍujaṅghāē
jaṅghā bāha tarīi va jalē thalē khandhaārakhuranibaddhā
sañjamaāyavirāhaṇa tahiyaṁ puṇa sañjamē kāyā
atthāhagāhapaṁ kāmagarōhārā jalē avāyā u
kaṇṭāhitēṇasāvaya thalambhi ēē bhavē dōsā
saggāmē'viya duvihaṁ gharantaraṁ nōgharantaraṁ cēva
tigharantarā parēṇaṁ gharantaraṁ taṁ tu nāyavvaṁ
nōgharantara'nēgavihaṁ vā pāḍagasāhīnivēsaṇagihēsu
kāyē khandhē mimmaya kaṁsēṇa va taṁ tu āṇejjā
sunnaṁ va asai kālō pagayaṁ va pahēṇagaṁ va pāsuttā
iya ēi kāi ghettuṁ dīvēi ya kāraṇaṁ taṁ tu
ēsēva kamō niyamā nisihābhihaḍē'vi hōi nāyavvō
aviiadāyagabhāvaṁ nisīhiaṁ taṁ tu nāyavvaṁ
aidūrajalantariyā kammāsaṅkāē mā na ghecchanti
āṇēti saṅkhaḍīō saḍḍhō saḍḍhī va pacchannaṁ
niggama dēula dānaṁ diyāi sannāi niggaē dānaṁ
siṭṭhaṁmi sēsagamanaṁ dinta'nnē vārayantē'nnē
bhuñjaṇa ajīra purimaḍḍhagāi acchanti bhuttasēsaṁ vā
āgamanisīhigāī na bhuñjaī sāvagāsaṅkā
ukkhittaṁ nikkhippai āsagayaṁ mallagaṁmi pāsagaē
khāmittu gayā saḍḍhā tē'vi ya suddhā asaḍhabhāvā
laddhaṁ pahēṇagaṁ mē amugatthagayāē saṅkhaḍīē vā
vandanagaṭṭhapaviṭṭhā dēi tayaṁ paṭṭhiya niyattā
nīyaṁ pahēṇagaṁ mē niyagāṇaṁ nicchiyaṁ va taṁ tēhiṁ
sāgari sayajjhiyaṁ vā paḍikuṭṭhā saṅkhaḍē ruṭṭhā
ēyaṁ tu aṇāinnaṁ duvihampiya āhaḍaṁ samakkhāyaṁ
āinnampiya duvihaṁ dēsē taha dēsadēsē ya
hatthasayaṁ khalu dēsō ārēṇaṁ hōi dēsadēsō ya

āiṇṇaṁ mivi tigihā taṁ ciya uvaōgapuvvāgā ।।
gāhā-373
parivēsaṇapantīē dūrapavēsē ya ghaṅghasālagihē
hatthasayā āinnaṁ gahaṇaṁ paraō u paḍikuṭṭhaṁ
hōi puṇa dēsadēsō antō giha sā na dīsaē jattha
ukkhēvāī tattha u sōyāī dēi uvaōgaṁ
ukkōsaṁ majjhima jahannagaṁ ca tivihaṁ tu hōi āinnaṁ
karapariyattaṁ jahannaṁ sayamukkasa majjhimaṁ sēsaṁ
pihiubbhinnakavāḍē phāsuya apphāsē ya boddhavē
apphāsuya puḍhavimāī phāsuya chagaṇāidaddaraē
ubbhinnē chakkāyā dānē kayavikkaē ya ahigaraṇaṁ
tē cēva kavāḍaṁmi vi savisēsā jantamāīsu
saccittapuḍhavilittaṁ lēlu silaṁ vā'vi dāumōlittaṁ
saccittapuḍhavilēvō cirampi udagaṁ aciralittē
ēvaṁ tu puvva nō littē kāyā ullimpaṇē'vi tē cēva
timmēuṁ uvalimpai jaumuddaṁ vāvi tāvēuṁ
jaha cēva puvvalittē kāya dāuṁ puṇō'vi taha cēva
uvalippantē kāyā muiaṅgāiṁ navari chaṭṭhē
parassa taṁ dēi saē va gēhē tellaṁ va lōṇaṁ va ghayaṁ gulaṁ vā
ugghāḍiē taṁmi karē avassaṁ sa vikkayaṁ tēṇa kiṇāi annaṁ
dānakayavikkayā cēva hōi ahigaraṇamajayabhāvassa
nivayanti jē ya tahiyaṁ jīvā muiyaṅgamūsāī
jahēva kumbhāisu puvvalittē ubbhijjamāṇē ya havanti kāyā
ōlimpamāṇē vi tahā tahēva kāyā kavāḍaṁmi vibhāsiyavvā
gharakōilasañcārā āvattaṇa pīḍhagāi heṭṭhuvariṁ
nintē ṭhiē ya antō ḍimbhāīpellaṇē dōsā
gheppai aṅkuciyāgaṁmi kavāḍē paidinē parivahantē
ajaūmuddiya gaṇṭhī paribhujjai daddarō jō ya
mālōhaḍampi duvihaṁ jahannamukkōsagaṁ ca boddhavvaṁ
aggatalē hi jahannaṁ tavvivarīyaṁ tu ukkōsaṁ
bhikkhū jahannagaṁmī gēruya ukkōsagaṁmi diṭṭhantō
ahiḍasaṇamālapaḍaṇē ya ēvamāī bhavē dōsā
mālābhimuhaṁ daṭṭhūṇa agāriṁ niggaō taō sāhū
taccaṇṇiya āgamanaṁ pucchā ya adinnadāṇatti
mālaṁmi kuṭṭha mōyaga sugandha ahi pavisaṇaṁ karē ḍakkā

annadiṇa sāhu āgama niddaya kahaṇā ya sambōhī ।।
gāhā-390
āsandipīḍhamañcakajaṁ tōḍūkhala paḍanta ubhayavahē
vocchēya paōsāī uḍḍāhamanāṇivāō ya
ēmēva ya ukkōsē vāraṇa nissēṇi guvviṇīpaḍaṇaṁ
gabbhitthikucchiphōḍaṇa puraō maraṇaṁ kahaṇa bōhī
uḍḍhamahē tiriyampiya ahavā mālōhaḍaṁ bhavē tivihaṁ
uḍḍhamahē ōyaraṇaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ kumbhāisū ubhayaṁ
daddarasilasōvāṇē puvvārūḍhē anuccamukkhittē
mālōhaḍaṁ na hōi sēsaṁ mālōhaḍaṁ hōi
tiriyāyaya ujjugaēṇa giṇhaī jaṁ karēṇa pāsantō
ēyamaṇuccukkhittaṁ uccukkhittaṁ bhavē sēsaṁ
acchijjampiya tivihaṁ pabhū ya sāmī ya tēṇaē cēva
acchijjaṁ paḍikuṭṭhaṁ samaṇāṇa na kappaē ghettuṁ
gōvālaē ya bhayaē kharaē puttē ya dhūya suṇhāē
aciyattasaṅkhaḍāī kēi paōsaṁ jahā gōvō
gōvapaō acchettuṁ dinnaṁ tu jaissa bhaidinē pahuṇā
payabhāṇūṇaṁ daṭṭhuṁ khiṁsai bhōī ruvē cēḍā
paḍiyaraṇa paōsēṇaṁ bhāvaṁ nāuṁ jaissa ālāvō
tannibbandhā gahiyaṁ handi u mukkō si mā bīyaṁ
nānivviṭṭhaṁ labbhai dāsī vi na bhujjaē ritē bhattā
donnēgayarapaōsaṁ jaṁ kāhī antarāyaṁ ca
sāmī cārabhaḍā vā sañjaya daṭṭhūṇa tēsi aṭṭhāē
kaluṇāṇaṁ acchejjaṁ sāhūṇa na kappaē ghettuṁ
āhārōvahimāī jai aṭṭhāē u kōi acchindē
saṅkhaḍi asaṅkhaḍīē taṁ giṇhantē imē dōsā
aciyattamantarāyaṁ tēnāhaḍa ēga'nēgavocchēō
nicchubhaṇāī dōsā tassa a lambhē ya jaṁ pāvē
tēṇō va sañjayaṭṭhā kaluṇāṇaṁ appaṇō va aṭṭhāē
vocchēya paōsaṁ vā na kappaī kappa'ṇunnāyaṁ
sañjayabhaddā tēṇā āyantī vā asantharē jaiṇaṁ
jai dētiṁ na ghettavvaṁ nicchubha vocchēu mā hojjā
ghayasattuyadiṭṭhantō samaṇunnāya va ghettuṇaṁ pacchā
denti tayaṁ tēsiṁ ciya samaṇunnāyā va bhuñjanti
ghayasattugadiṭṭhantō ambāpāē ya tappiyā piyarō

kāmamakāmē dhammō niōiē amhavi kayāī ।।
gāhā-407
aimasiṭṭhaṁ paḍikuṭṭhaṁ anunāyaṁ kappaē suvihiyāṇaṁ
laḍḍuga collaga jantē saṅkhaḍi khīrāvaṇāīsu
battīsā sāmannē tē kahiṁ ṇhāuṁ gayatti ia vuttē
parasantiēṇa punnaṁ na tarasi kāunti paccāha
aviya hu battīsāē dinnēhiṁ tavēga mōyagō na bhavē
appavayaṁ bahuāyaṁ jai jāṇasi dēhi tō majjhaṁ
lābhiya nentō puṭṭhō kiṁ laddhaṁ? natthi pacchimō dāē
iyarō'vi āha nāhaṁ dēmitti sahōḍha cōratti
giṇhaṇa kaḍḍhaṇa vavahāra pacchakaḍuḍḍāha puccha nivvisaē
apahuṁmi hunti dōsā pahuṁmi dinnē taō gahaṇaṁ
ēmēva ya jantaṁmivi saṅkhaḍi khīrē ya āvaṇāīsuṁ
sāmannaṁ paḍikuṭṭhaṁ kappai ghettuṁ aṇunnāyaṁ
cullatti dāramahuṇā bahuvattavvanti taṁ kayaṁ pacchā
vannēi gurū sō puṇa sāmiyahatthīṇa vinnēō
chinnamachinnō duvihō hōi achinnō nisiṭṭha anisiṭṭhō
chinnambhi cullagaṁmī kappai ghettuṁ nisiṭṭhaṁmi
chinnē diṭṭhamadiṭṭhō jō ya nisiṭṭhō bhavē achinnō ya
sō kappai iyarō uṇa adiṭṭhadiṭṭhō va'ṇunnāō
anisiṭṭhamaṇunnāyaṁ kappai ghettuṁ tahēva addiṭṭhaṁ
jaḍḍassa ya anisiṭṭhaṁ na kappaī kappai adiṭṭhaṁ
nivapiṇḍō gayabhattaṁ gahaṇāī antarāiyamadinnaṁ
ḍombassa santiēvi hu abhikkha vasahīya phēḍaṇayā
ajjhōyaraō tivihō jāvantiya sadharamīsapāsaṇḍē
mūlaṁmi ya puvvakayē ōyaraī tiṇha aṭṭhāē
taṇḍulajalaāyāṇē pupphaphalē sāgavēsaṇē lōṇē
parimāṇē nāṇattaṁ ajjhōyaramīsajāē ya
jāvantiē visōhī sagharapāsaṇḍimīsaē pūī
chinnē visōhi dinnaṁmi kappaī na kappaī sēsaṁ
chinnaṁmi taō ukkaḍḍhiyaṁmi kappai pihīkaē sēsaṁ
āhāvaṇāē dinnaṁ ca tattiyaṁ kappaē sēsaṁ
ēsō sōlasabhēō duhā kīraī uggamō
ēgō visōhikōḍī avisōhī u cāvarā
āhākammuddēsiya caramatigaṁ pūi mīsajāē ya

bāyarapāhuḍiyāviya ajjhōyaraē ya carimadugaṁ ।।
gāhā-424
uggamakōḍī avayava lēvālēvē ya akayaē kappē
kañjiya āyāmaga cāulōya saṁsaṭṭha pūīō
sukkēṇa'vi jaṁ chikkaṁ tu asuiṇā dhōvaē jahā lōē
iha sukkēṇa'vi chikkaṁ dōvai kammēṇa bhāṇaṁ tu?
lēvālēvatti jaṁ vuttaṁ jampi davvamalēvaḍaṁ
tampi ghettuṁ na kappanti takkāi kimu lēvaḍaṁ?
āhāya jaṁ kīrai taṁ tu kammaṁ vajjēhihī ōyaṇamēgamēva
sōvīra āyāmaga cāulō dagaṁ kammanti tō taggahaṇaṁ karenti
sēsā visōhikōḍī bhattaṁ pānaṁ vigiñca jahasattiṁ
aṇalakkhiya mīsadavē savvavivēgē'vayava suddhō
davvāiō vivēgō davvē jaṁ davva jaṁ jahiṁ khettē
kālē akālahīnaṁ asaḍhō jaṁ passaī bhāvē
sukkollasarisapāē asarisapāē ya ettha caubhaṅgō
tullē tullanivāē tattha duvē donna'tullā u
sukkē sukkaṁ paḍiyaṁ vigiñciuṁ hōi taṁ suhaṁ paḍhamō
bīyaṁmi davaṁ chōḍhuṁ gālanti davaṁ karaṁ dāuṁ
taiyaṁmi karaṁ chōḍhuṁ ulliñcai ōyaṇāi jaṁ tarau
dullahadavvaṁ carimē tattiyamittaṁ vigiñcanti
santharē savvamujjhanti caubhaṅgō asantharē
asaḍhō sujjhaī tēsuṁ māyāvī jēsu bajjhaī
kōḍīkaraṇaṁ duvihaṁ uggamakōḍī visōhikōḍī ya
uggamakōḍī chakkaṁ visōhikōḍī anēgavihā
nava cēva aḍhārasagaṁ sattāvīsā tahēva caupannā
nauī dō cēva sayā u sattarī hōi kōḍīṇaṁ
sōlasa uggamadōsē gihiṇōu samuṭṭhiē viyāṇāhi
uppāyaṇāē dōsē sāhūu samuṭṭhiē jāṇa
nāmaṁ ṭhavaṇā daviē bhāvē uppāyaṇā muṇēyavvā
davvaṁmi hōi tivihā bhāvaṁmi u sōlasapayā u
āsūyamāiēhiṁ bālaciyaturaṅga bīyamāīhiṁ
suyaāsadumāīṇaṁ uppāyaṇayā u saccittā
kanagarayayāiyāṇaṁ jaheṭṭhadhāuvihiyā u accittā
mīsā u sabhaṇḍāṇaṁ dupayāikayā u uppattī
bhāvē pasattha iyarō kōhāuppāyaṇā u apasatthō

kōhāijuyā dhāyāiṇaṁ ca nāṇāi u pasatthā ।।
gāhā-441
dhāī dūi nimittē ājīva vaṇīmagē tigicchā ya
kōhē mānē māyā lōbhē ya havanti dasa ēē
puvvimpacchāsanthava vijjā bhantē ya cuṇṇa jōgē ya
uppāyaṇāi dōsā sōlasamē mūlakammē ya
khīrē ya majjaṇē maṇḍaṇē ya kīlāvaṇaṅkadhāī ya
ekkekkāviya duvihā karaṇē kārāvaṇē cēva
dhārēi dhīyaē vā dhayanti vā tamiti tēṇa dhāī u
jahavihavaṁ āsi purā khīrāī pañca dhāīō
khīrāhārō rōvai majjha kayāsāya dēhi ṇaṁ pijjē
pacchā va majjha dāhisi alaṁ va bhujjō va ēhāmi
maimaṁ arōgi dīhāuō ya hōi avimāṇiō bālō
dullabhayaṁ khu suyamuhaṁ pijjāhi ahaṁ va sē dēmi
ahigaraṇa bhaddapantā kammudaya gilāṇaē ya uḍḍāhō
caḍukārī ya avaṇṇō niyagō annaṁ ca jaṁ saṅkē
ayamavarō u vikappō bhikkhāyari saḍḍhi addhiī pucchā
dukkhasahāya vibhāsā hiyaṁ ca dhāittaṇaṁ ajjō
vayagaṇḍataṇuyathūlattaṇēhiṁ taṁ pucchiuṁ ayāṇantō
tattha gaō tassamakkhaṁ bhaṇāi taṁ pāsiuṁ bālaṁ
ahuṇuṭṭhiyaṁ va aṇavikkhiyaṁ va iṇamaṁ kulaṁ tu mannāmi
punnēhiṁ jahitāē jadicchāē va taraī bālēṇa sūēmō
thērī dubbalakkhīrā cimiḍhō pelliyamuhō aithaṇīē
taṇuī u mandakhīrā kupparathaṇiyāē sūimuhō
jā jēṇa hōi vaṇṇēṇa ukkaḍā garahaē ya taṁ tēṇaṁ
garahai samāṇa tivvaṁ pasatthamiyaraṁ ca duvvannaṁ
uvvaṭṭiyā paōsaṁ chōbhaga ubbhāmaō ya sē jaṁ tu
hojjā majjhavi vigghō visāi iyarī va ēmēva
ēmēva sēsiyāsuvi suyamāisu karaṇakāraṇaṁ sagihē
iḍḍhīsu ya dhāīsu ya tahēva uvvaṭṭiyāṇa gamō
lōlai mahīē dhūlīē guṇḍiō ṇhāṇi ahavaṇaṁ majjē
jalabhīru abalanayanō aiuppilaṇē a rattacchō
abbhaṅgiya saṁvāhiya uvvaṭṭiya majjiyaṁ ca tō bālaṁ
uvaṇēi majjadhāī maṇḍaṇadhāīē suidēhaṁ
usuāiēhiṁ maṇḍēhi tāva ṇaṁ ahavaṇaṁ vibhūsēmi

hatthiccagā va pāē kayā galiccā va pāē vā ।।
gāhā-458
ḍhaḍḍharasara chunnamuhō mauyagirō mauyamammaṇullāvō
ullāvaṇagāīhiṁ va karēi kārēi vā kiḍḍaṁ
thullīē viyaḍapāō bhaggakaḍī sukkaḍāē dukkhaṁ ca
nimbhaṁsakakkhaḍakarēhiṁ bhīruō hōi gheppantē
kollairē vatthavvō dattō āhiṇḍaō bhavē sīsō
avaharai dhāipiṇḍaṁ aṅgulijalaṇē ya sādivvaṁ
ōmē saṅgamathērā gaccha visajjanti jaṅghabalahīnā
navabhāgakhettavasahī dattassa ya āgamō tāhē
uvasabāhiṁ ṭhāṇaṁ annāuñchēṇa saṅkilēsō ya
pūyaṇacēḍē mā ruya paḍilābhaṇa viyaḍaṇā sammaṁ
saggāma paraggāmē duvihā dūī u hōi nāyavvā
sā vā sō vā bhaṇaī bhaṇai va taṁ channavayaṇēṇaṁ
ekkekkāviya duvihā pāgaḍa channā ya channa duvihā u
lōguttari tatthēgā bīyā puṇa ubhayapakkhēsu
bhikkhāiē vaccantē appāhaṇi nēi khantiyāīṇaṁ
sā tē amugaṁ māyā sō va piyā tē imaṁ bhaṇai
dūittaṁ khu garahiyaṁ appāhiuṁ biiyapaccayā bhaṇati
avikōviyā suyā tē jā āha maiṁ bhaṇasu khantiṁ
ubhayē'viya pacchannā khanta! kahijjāhi khantiyāē tumaṁ
taṁ taha sañjāyantiya tahēva aha taṁ karejjāhi
gāmāṇa dōṇha vēraṁ sejjāyari dhūya tattha khantassa
vahapariṇaya khanta'jjhattha ṇaṁ va nāē kaē juddhaṁ
jāmāiputtapaimāraṇaṁ ca kēṇa kahiyanti janavāō
jāmāiputtapaimāraēṇa khantēṇa mē siṭṭhaṁ
niyamā tikālavisaē'vi nimittē chavvihē bhavē dōsā
sajjaṁ tu vaṭṭamāṇē āubhaē tatthimaṁ nāyaṁ
lābhālābhaṁ suhaṁ dukkhaṁ jīviyaṁ maraṇaṁ tahā
chavvihē'vi nimittē u dōsā honti imē suṇa
ākampiyā nimittēṇa bhōiṇī bhōiē ciragayaṁmi
puvvabhaṇiē kahaṁ tē āgau? ruṭṭhō ya vaḍavāē
dūrābhōyaṇa ēgāgi āgaō pariṇayassa paccōṇī
pucchā samaṇē kahaṇaṁ sāiyaṅkāra sumiṇāī
kōvō vaḍavāgabbhaṁ ca pucchiō pañcapuṇḍamāhaṁsu

phālaṇa diṭṭhē jai nēva tō tuhaṁ avitahaṁ kai vā ।।
gāhā-475
jāī kula gaṇa kammē sippē ājīvaṇā u pañcavihā
sūyāē asūyāē va appāṇa kahēhi ekkekkē
jāīkulē vibhāsā gaṇō u mallāi kamma kisimāī
tuṇṇāi sippa'ṇāvajjagaṁ ca kammēyarā''vajjaṁ
hōmāyavitahakaraṇē najjai jaha sottiyassa puttotti
vasiō vēsa gurukulē āyariyaguṇē va sūēi
sammamasammā kiriyā anēna ūṇā'hiyā va vivarīyā
samihāmantāhuiṭhāṇa jāgakālē ya ghōsāī
uggāikulēsu vi ēvamēva gaṇamaṇḍalappavēsāī
dēuladarisaṇabhāsā uvanayaṇē daṇḍamāiyā
kattari paōaṇāvekkha vatthubahuvittharēsu ēmēva
kammēsu ya sippēsu ya sammamasammēsu sūīyarā
samaṇē mahāṇi kivaṇē atihī sāṇē ya hōi pañcamaē
vaṇi jāyaṇatti vaṇiō pāyappāṇaṁ vaṇēitti
mayamāivacchagampiva vaṇēi āhāramāilōbhēṇaṁ
samaṇēsu mahāṇēsu ya kiviṇā'tihisāṇabhattēsu
niggantha sakka tāvasa gēruya ājīva pañcahā samaṇā
tēsi parivēsaṇāē lōbhēṇa vaṇijja kō appaṁ?
bhuñjanti cittakammaṭṭhiyā va kāruṇiya dāṇaruiṇō ya
avi kāmagaddabhēsuvi na nassaī kiṁ puṇa jaīsu?
micchattathirīkaraṇaṁ uggamadōsā ya tēsu vā gacchē
caḍukāra'dinnadāṇā paccatthiga mā puṇō intu
lōyāṇuggahakārisu bhūmīdēvēsu bahuphalaṁ dānaṁ
avi nāma bambhabandhusu kiṁ puṇa chakkammaniraēsu?
kivaṇēsu dummaṇēsu ya abandhavāyaṅkajuṅgiyaṅgēsuṁ
pūyāhijjē lōē dānapaḍāgaṁ harai dintō
pāēṇa dēi lōgō uvagārisu pariciēsu jhusiēsu
jō puṇa addhākhinnaṁ atihiṁ pūēi taṁ dānaṁ
avi nāma hojja sulabhō gōṇāīṇaṁ taṇāi āhārō
chicchikkārahayāṇaṁ na hu sulahō hōi suṇahā ṇaṁ
kēlāsabhavaṇā ēē āgayā gujjhagā mahiṁ
caranti jakkharūvēṇaṁ puyā'pūyā hiyā'hiyā
ēēṇa majjha bhāvō diṭṭhō lōē paṇāmahejjaṁmi

ekkekkē puvvuttā bhaddagapantāiṇō dōsā ।।
gāhā-492
ēmēva kāgamāī sāṇaggahaṇēṇa sūiyā honti
jō vā jaṁmi pasattō vaṇai tahiṁ puṭṭha'puṭṭhō vā
dānaṁ na hōi aphalaṁ pattamapattēsu sannijujjantaṁ
iya vibhaṇiē'vi dōsā pasaṁsaō kiṁ puṇa apattē
bhaṇai nāhaṁ vejjō ahavā'vi kahēi appaṇō kiriyaṁ
ahavā'vi vijjayāē tiviha tigicchā muṇēyavvā
bhikkhāi gaō rōgī kiṁ vijjō'hanti pucchiō bhaṇai
atthāvattīē kayā abuhāṇaṁ bōhaṇā ēvaṁ
ērisayaṁ ciya dukkhaṁ bhēsajjēṇa amugēṇa pauṇaṁ mē
sahasuppannaṁ va ruyaṁ vārēmō aṭṭhamāīhiṁ
saṁsōdhana saṁsamaṇaṁ niyāṇaparivajjaṇaṁ ca jaṁ tattha
āgantu dhāukhōbhē ya āmaē kuṇai kiriyaṁ tu
assañjamajōgāṇaṁ pasandhaṇaṁ kāyaghāya ayagōlō
dubbalavagghā haraṇaṁ accudayē giṇhaṇuḍḍāhē
hatthakappa giriphulliya rāyagihaṁ khalu tahēva campā ya
kaḍaghayapunnē iṭṭaga laḍḍuga taha sīhakēsaraē
vijjātavappabhāvaṁ rāyakulē vā'vi vallabhattaṁ sē
nāuṁ ōrassabalaṁ jō labbhai dēi bhayā kōhapiṇḍō sō
annēsi dijjamāṇē jāyantō vā aladdhiō kuppē
kōhaphalaṁmi'vi diṭṭhē jō labbhai kōhapiṇḍō sō
karaḍuyabhattamaladdhuṁ annahiṁ dāhittha ēva vaccantō
thērā bhōyaṇa taiē āikkhaṇa khāmaṇā dānaṁ
ucchāhiō parēṇa va laddhipasaṁsāhiṁ vā samuttaiō
avamāniō parēṇa ya jō ēsai mānapiṇḍō sō
iṭṭagachaṇaṁmi paripiṇḍiyāṇa ullāva kō nu hu pagēva
āṇijja iṭṭagāō? khuḍḍō paccāha āṇēmi
jaiviya tā pajjattā agulaghayāhiṁ na tāhiṁ ṇē kajjaṁ
jārisiyāō icchaha tā āṇēmitti nikkhantō
ōhāsiya paḍisiddhō bhaṇai agāriṁ avassimā majjhaṁ
jai lahasi tō taṁ mē nāsāē kuṇasu mōyanti
kassa ghara pucchiūṇaṁ parisāē amui kairau pucchē
kiṁ tēṇa'mhē jāyasu sō kiviṇō sa dāhii na tujjhaṁ
dāhāmi tēṇa bhaṇiē jai na bhavasi chaṇhamēsi purisāṇaṁ

annayarō tō tē'haṁ parisāmajjhaṁmi paṇayā mi ।।
gāhā-509
sēyaṅguli baguḍḍāvē kiṅkarē ṇhāyaē tahā
giddhāvaraṅkhi haddannaē ya purisāhamā chā u
jāyasu na ērisō'haṁ iṭṭagā dēhi puvvamaigantuṁ
mālā uttāri gulaṁ bhōēmi dietti ārūḍhā
siiavaṇaṇa paḍilābhaṇa dissiyarī bōlamaṅgulī nāsaṁ
duṇhēgayarapaōsō āyavivattī ya uḍḍāhō
rāyagihē dhammaruī asāḍhabhūī ya khuḍḍaō tassa
rāyanaḍagēhapavisaṇa sambhōiya mōyaē lambhō
āyariya uvajjhāē saṅghāḍaga kāṇakhujja taddōsī
naḍapāsaṇa pajjattaṁ nikāyaṇa dinē dinē dānaṁ
dhūyaduē sandēsō dāna siṇēha karaṇaṁ rahē karaṇaṁ
liṅgaṁ muyatti gurusiṭṭha vivāhē uttamā pagaī
rāyagharē ya kayāī nimmahilaṁ nāḍagaṁ naḍāgacchī
tā ya viharaṁmi mattā uvari gihē dōvi pāsuttā
vāghāēṇa niyattō dissa vicēlā virāga sambōhī
iṅgiyanāē pucchā pajīvaṇaṁ raṭṭhapālanti
ikkhāgavaṁsa bharahō āyaṁsagharē ya kēvalālōō
hārāikhivaṇa gahaṇaṁ uvasagga na sō niyattotti
tēna samaṁ pavvaiyā pañca narasayatti nāḍaē ḍahaṇaṁ
gēlannakhamagapāhuṇa thērādiṭṭhā ya bīyaṁ tu
labbhantampi na giṇhai annaṁ amuganti ajja ghecchāmi
bhaddarasanti va kāuṁ giṇhai khaddhaṁ siṇiddhāī
campā chaṇaṁmi ghicchāmi mōyaē tē'vi sīhakēsaraē
paḍisēha dhammalābhaṁ kāūṇaṁ sīhakēsaraē
saḍḍha'ḍḍharattakēsarabhāyaṇabharaṇaṁ ca puccha purimaḍḍhē
uvaōga santa cōyaṇa sāhutti vigiñcaṇē nāṇaṁ
duvihō u santhavō khalu sambandhī vayaṇasanthavō cēva
ekkekkōviya duvihō puvviṁ pacchā ya nāyavvō
māyapii puvvasanthava sāsūsasurāiyāṇa pacchā u
gihi santhava sambandhaṁ karēi puvvaṁ ca pacchā vā
āyavayaṁ ca paravayaṁ nāuṁ sambandhaē tayaṇurūvaṁ
mama māyā ērisiyā sasā va dhūyā va nattāī
addhiī diṭṭhipaṇhava pucchā kahaṇaṁ mamērisī jananī

thaṇakhēvō sambandhō vihavā suṇhāidānaṁ ca ।।
gāhā-526
pacchāsanthavadōsā sāsū vihavādidhūyadānaṁ ca
bhajjā mamērisicciya sajjō dhāō va bhaṅgō vā
māyāvī caḍuyārī amhaṁ ōhāvaṇaṁ kuṇai ēsō
nicchubhaṇāī pantō karijja bhaddēsu paḍibandhō
guṇasanthavaṇē puvviṁ santāsantēṇa jō thuṇijjāhi
dāyāramadinnaṁmī sō puvviṁ santhavō havai
ēsō sō jassa guṇā viyaranti avāriyā dasadisāsu
iharā kahāsu suṇimō paccakkhaṁ ajja diṭṭhō si
guṇasanthavēṇa pacchā santāsantēṇa jō thuṇijjāhi
dāyāraṁ dinnaṁmī sō pacchā santhavō hōi
vimalīkaya'mha cakkhū jahatthayā viyariyā guṇā tujjhaṁ
āsi purā ṇē saṅkā sampayaṁ nissaṅkiyaṁ jāyaṁ
vijjāmantaparūvaṇa vijjāē bhikkhuvāsaō hōi
mantaṁmi sīsavēyaṇa tattha muruṇḍēṇa diṭṭhantō
paripiṇḍaṇamullāvō aipantō bhikkhuvāsaō dāvē
jai icchai anujāṇaha ghayagulavatthāṇi dāvēmi
gantuṁ vijjāmantaṇa kiṁ dēmi ? ghayaṁ gulaṁ ca vatthāī
dinnē paḍisāharaṇaṁ kēṇa hiyaṁ kēṇa muṭṭhō mi ?
paḍivijjathambhaṇāī sō vā annō va sē karijjāhi
pāvājīvīmāī kammaṇagārī ya gahaṇāī
jaha jaha paēsiṇī jāṇugaṁmi pālittaō bhamāḍēi
taha taha sīsē viyaṇā paṇassai maruṇḍarāyassa
paḍimantathambhaṇāī sō vā annō va sē karijjāhi
pāvājīviyamāī kammaṇagārī bhavē bīyaṁ
cuṇṇē antaddhāṇē cāṇakkē pāyalēvaṇē samiē
mūla vivāhē dō daṇḍiṇī u āyāṇaparisāḍē
jaṅghāhīnā ōmē kusumapurē sissajōga rahakaraṇaṁ
khuḍḍadugañjaṇasuṇaṇā gamanaṁ dēsantarē saraṇaṁ
bhikkhē parihāyantē thērāṇaṁ tēsi ōmē dintāṇaṁ
sahabhujja candaguttē ōmōyariyāē dōballaṁ
cāṇakkapuccha iṭṭālacuṇṇadāraṁ pihittu dhūmē ya
daṭṭhuṁ kuccha pasaṁsā thērasamīvē uvālambhō
jē vijjamantadōsā tē cciya vasikaraṇamāicuṇṇēhiṁ

ēgamanēga paōsaṁ kujjā patthāraō vā'vi ।।
gāhā-543
sūbhagadubbhaggakarā jōgā āhārimā ya iyarē ya
āghaṁsadhūvavāsā pāyapalēvāiṇō iyarē
naikaṇhabinna dīvē pañcasayā tāvasāṇa nivasanti
pavvadivasēsu kulavaī pālēvuttāra sakkārē
jana sāvagāṇa khiṁsaṇa samiya'kkhaṇa māiṭhāṇa lēvēṇa
sāvaya payattakaraṇaṁ avinaya lōē calaṇadhōē
paḍilābhiya vaccantā nibbuḍa naikūla milaṇa samiyā''ō
vimhiya pañcasayā tāvasāṇa pavvajja sāhā ya
akumāra khayaṁ jōṇī vivarīyaṭṭhā nivēsaṇaṁ vā'vi
gammapaē pāyaṁ vā jō kuvvai mūlakammaṁ taṁ
adhiī pucchā āsanna vivāhē bhinnakannasāhaṇayā
āyamaṇapiyaṇa ōsaha akkhaya jajjīvaahigaraṇaṁ
jaṅghā parijiya saḍḍhī addhii āṇijjaē mama khavattī
jōgō jōṇugghāḍaṇa paḍisēha paōsa uḍḍāhō
mā tē phaṁsejja kulaṁ adijjamāṇā suyā vayaṁ pattā
dhammō ya'lōhiyassā jai bindū tattiyā narayā
kiṁ na ṭhavijjai puttō pattō kulagottakittisantāṇō
pacchāviya taṁ kajjaṁ asaṅgagahō mā ya nāsijjā
kiṁ addhi itti pucchā savittiṇī gabbhiṇitti sē dēvī
gabbhāhāṇaṁ tujjhavi karōmi mā addhiiṁ kuṇasu
jaivi suō mē hōhī tahavi kaṇiṭṭhotti iyara juvarāyā
dēi parisāḍaṇaṁ sē nāē ya paōsa patthārō
saṅkhaḍikaraṇē kāyā kāmapavittiṁ ca kuṇai ēgattha
ēgatthuḍḍāhāī jajjiya bhōgantarāyaṁ ca
ēvaṁ tu gaviṭṭhassā uggamauppāyaṇāvisuddhassa
gahaṇavisōhivisuddhassa hōi gahaṇaṁ tu piṇḍassa
uppāyaṇāē dōsē sāhūu samuṭṭhiē yā imē bhaṇiyā
dasaēsaṇāi dōsē āyapara samuṭṭhiē vocchaṁ
donni u sāhusamutthā saṅkiya taha bhāvaō'pariṇayaṁ ca
sēsā aṭṭhavi niyamā gihiṇō ya samuṭṭhiē jāṇa
nāmaṁ ṭhavaṇā daviē bhāvē gahaṇēsaṇā muṇēyavvā
davvē vānarajūhaṁ bhāvaṁmi ya dasa payā hunti
parisaḍiyapaṇḍupattaṁ vanasaṇḍaṁ daṭṭhu annahiṁ pēsē

jūhavaī paḍiyaraē jūhēṇa samaṁ tahiṁ gacchē ।।
gāhā-560
sayamēvālōēuṁ jūhavaī taṁ vanaṁ samantēṇa
viyarai tēsi payāraṁ cariūṇa ya tō dahaṁ gacchē
ōyarantaṁ payaṁ daṭṭhu nīharantaṁ na dīsaī
nālēṇa piyaha pāṇīyaṁ nēsa nikkāraṇō dahō
saṅkiya makkhiya nikkhitta pihiya sāhariya dāyagummīsē
apariṇaya litta chaḍḍiya ēsaṇadōsā dasa havanti
saṅkāē caubhaṅgō dōsu vi gahaṇē ya bhuñjaṇē laggō
jaṁ saṅkiyamāvannō paṇavīsā carimaē suddhō
uggamadōsā sōlasa āhākammāi ēsaṇādōsā
nava makkhiyāi ēē paṇavīsā carimaē suddhō
chaumatthō suyanāṇī uvauttō ujjuō payattēṇaṁ
āvannō paṇavīsaṁ suyanāṇapamāṇaō suddhō
ōhō suōvauttō suyanāṇī jai vi giṇhai asuddhaṁ
taṁ kēvalī vi bhuñjai appamāṇa suyaṁ bhavē iharā
suttassa appamāṇē caraṇābhāvō taō ya mokkhassa
mokkhassa'viya abhāvē dikkhapavittī niratthā u
kintiha khaddha ! bhikkhā dijjai na ya tarai pucchiuṁ hirimaṁ
iya saṅkāē dhettuṁ taṁ bhuñjai saṅkiō cēva
hiyaēṇa saṅkaēṇaṁ gahiō annēṇaṁ sōhiyā sā ya
pagayaṁ pahēṇagaṁ vā sōuṁ nissaṅkiō bhuñjē
jārisaya cciya laddhā khaddhā bhikkhā maē amuyagēhē
annēhi vi tārisiyā viyaḍanta nisāmaē taiē
jai saṅkā dōsakarī ēvaṁ suddhampi hōi avisuddhaṁ
nissaṅkamēsiyantiya anēsaṇijjampi niddōsaṁ
avisuddhō pariṇāmō ēgayarē avaḍiō ya pakkhaṁmi
ēsimpi kuṇai ṇēsiṁ aṇēsimēsiṁ visuddhō u
duvihaṁ ca makkhiyaṁ khalu saccittaṁ cēva hōi accittaṁ
saccittaṁ puṇa tivihaṁ accittaṁ hōi duvihaṁ tu
puḍhavī āu vaṇassai tivihaṁ saccittamakkhiyaṁ hōi
accittaṁ puṇa duvihaṁ garahiyamiyarē ya bhayaṇā u
sukkēṇa sarakkhēṇa makkhiyamallēṇa puḍhavikāēṇaṁ
savvampi makkhiyaṁ taṁ ettō āuṁmi vocchāmi
purapacchakamma sasiṇiddhullē cattāri āubhēyāō

ukkiṭṭharasālittaṁ paritta'nantaṁ mahiruhēsu ।।
gāhā-577
sēsēhi u kāēhiṁ tīhi vi tēūsamīraṇatasēhiṁ
saccittaṁ mīsaṁ vā na makkhitaṁ atthi ullaṁ vā
saccittamakkhiyaṁmi u hatthē mattē ya hōi caubhaṅgō
āitiē paḍisēhō carimē bhaṅgē aṇunnā u
accittamakkhiyaṁmi u causu vi bhaṅgēsu hōi bhayaṇā u
agarahiēṇa u gahaṇaṁ paḍisēhō garahiē hōi
saṁsajjimēhiṁ vajjaṁ agarahiēhimpi gōrasadavēhiṁ
mahughayatella gulēhi ya mā macchipivīliyāghāō
maṁsavasasōṇiyāsava lōē vā garahiēhiṁ vivajjejjā
ubhaō'vi garahiēhiṁ muttuccārēhiṁ chittampi
saccittamīsaēsu duvihaṁ kāēsu hōi nikkhittaṁ
ekkekkaṁ taṁ duvihaṁ anantara paramparaṁ cēva
puḍhavī āukkāē tēu vāū vaṇassai tasāṇaṁ
ekkekka duhā'nantara parampara'gaṇiṁmi sattavihā
saccittapuḍhavikāē saccittō cēva puḍhavi nikkhittō
āū tēu vaṇassai samīraṇa tasēsu ēmēva
ēmēva sēsayāṇavi nikkhēvō hōi jīvakāyakāēsuṁ
ekkekkō saṭṭhāṇē paraṭhāṇē pañca pañcēva
ēmēva mīsaēsu vi mīsāṇa sacēyaṇāṇa nikkhēvō
mīsāṇaṁ mīsēsu ya dōṇhampiya hōi accittē
jattha u sacittamīsē caubhaṅgō tattha caūsu vi agijjhaṁ
taṁ tu anantara iyaraṁ paritta'nantaṁ ca vanakāē
ahavaṇa sacittamīsō u ēgaō ēgaō u accittō
etthavi caukkabhaṅgō tatthāitiē kahā natthi
jaṁ puṇa acittadavvaṁ nikkhippai cēyaṇēsu davvēsu
tahiṁ maggaṇā u iṇamō anantaraparamparā hōi
ōgāhimāyanantaraṁ paramparaṁ piḍharagāi puḍhavīē
navanīyāi anantara paramparaṁ nāvāmāīsu
vijjhāyamummuriṅgālamēva appattapattasamajālē
vokkantē sattadugaṁ jantōlittē ya jayaṇāē
vijjhāutti na dīsai aggī dīsēi indhaṇē chūḍhē
āpiṅgala aganikaṇā mummura nijjāla iṅgālē
appattā u cautthē jālā piḍharaṁ tu pañcamē pattā

chaṭṭhē puṇa kaṇṇasamā jālā samaicchiyā carimē ।।
gāhā-594
pāsōlittakaḍāhē parisāḍī natthi tampiya visālaṁ
sō'viya aciracchūḍhō ucchurasō nāiusiṇō ya
usiṇōdagampi dheppai guḍarasapariṇāmiyaṁ aṇaccusiṇaṁ
jaṁ ca aghaṭṭiyakannaṁ ghaṭṭiyapaḍaṇaṁmi mā aggī
pāsōlittakaḍāhē'naccusiṇē aparisāḍa'ghaṭṭantē
sōlasa bhaṅgavigappā paḍhamē'ṇunnā na sēsēsu
payasamadugaabbhāsē māṇaṁ bhaṅgāṇa tēsimā rayaṇā
ēgantariyaṁ lahuguru duguṇā duguṇā ya vāmēsu
duvihavirāhaṇa usiṇē chaḍḍaṇa hānī ya bhāṇabhēō ya
vāukkhittānantaraparamparā pappaḍiya vatthī
hariyāi anantariyā paramparaṁ piḍharamāisu vaṇaṁmi
pūpāī piṭṭha'nantara bhariē kuubāisū iyarā
saccittē accittē mīsaga pihiyaṁmi hōi caubhaṅgō
āitigē paḍisēhō carimē bhaṅgaṁmi bhayaṇā u
jaha cēva u nikkhittē sañjōgā cēva honti bhaṅgā ya
ēmēva ya pihiyaṁmi vi nāṇattamiṇaṁ taiyabhaṅgē
aṅgāradhūviyāī anantarō santarō sarāvāī
tatthēva airavāū paramparaṁ batthiṇā pihiē
airaṁ phalāipihitaṁ vaṇaṁmi iyaraṁ tu piccha piḍharāī
kacchavasañcārāī anantarānantarē chaṭṭhē
guru guruṇā guru lahuṇā lahuyaṁ guruēṇa dō'vi lahuyāiṁ
accittēṇavi pihiē caubhaṅgō dōsu aggejjhaṁ
saccittē accittē mīsaga sāhāraṇē ya caubhaṅgō
āitiē paḍisēhō carimē bhaṅgaṁmi bhayaṇā u
jaha cēva u nikkhittē sañjōgā cēva honti bhaṅgā ya
tahā cēva u sāharaṇē nāṇattamiṇaṁ taiyabhaṅgē
mattēṇa jēṇa dāhii tattha adijjaṁ tu hojja asanāī
chōḍhu tayannahi tēṇaṁ dēī aha hōi sāharaṇaṁ
bhūmāiēsu taṁ puṇa sāharaṇaṁ hōi chasu vi kāēsu
jaṁ taṁ duhā acittaṁ sāharaṇaṁ tattha caubhaṅgō
sukkē sukkaṁ paḍhamō sukkē ullaṁ tu biiyaō bhaṅgō
ullē sukkaṁ taiō ullē ullaṁ cautthō u
ekkekkē caubhaṅgō sukkāīēsu causu bhaṅgēsu

thōvē thōvaṁ thōvē bahuṁ ca vivarīya dō annē ।।
gāhā-611
jattha u thōvē thōvaṁ sukkē ullaṁ ca chuhai taṁ gejjhaṁ
jai taṁ tu samukkhēuṁ thōvāhāraṁ dalai annaṁ
ukkhēvē nikkhēvē mahallabhāṇaṁmi luddha vaha ḍāhō
aciyattaṁ vocchēō chakkāyavahō ya gurumattē
thōvē thōvaṁ chūḍhaṁ sukkaṁ ullaṁ tu taṁ tu āinnaṁ
bahuyaṁ tu aṇāinnaṁ kaḍadōsō sotti kāūṇaṁ
bālē vuḍḍhē mattē ummattē vēviē ya jariē ya
andhillaē pagaliē ārūḍhē pāuyāhiṁ ca
hatthu'duniyalabaddhē vivajjiē cēva hatthapāēhiṁ
tērāsi guvviṇī bālavaccha bhuñjanti ghusulintī
bhajjanti ya dalayantī kaṇḍantī cēva taha ya pīsantī
pījantī ruñcantī kattanti pamaddamāṇī ya
chakkāyavaggahatthā samaṇaṭṭhā nikkhivittu tē cēva
tē cēvōgāhantī saṅghaṭṭantā'rabhantī ya
saṁsattēṇa ya davvēṇa littahatthā ya littamattā ya
uvvattantī sāhāraṇaṁ va dintī ya cōriyayaṁ
pāhuḍiyaṁ ca ṭhavantī sapaccavāyā paraṁ ca uddissa
ābhōgamanābhōgē dalantī vajjaṇijjā ē
ēēsi dāyagāṇaṁ gahaṇaṁ kēsiñci hōi bhaiyavvaṁ
kēsiñcī aggahaṇaṁ tavvivarīē bhavē gahaṇaṁ
kabbaṭṭhiga appāhaṇa dinnē annanna gahaṇa pajjattaṁ
khantiya maggaṇadinnē uḍḍāha paōsa cārabhaḍā
thērō galantalālō kampaṇahatthō paḍijja vā dentō
apahutti ya aciyattaṁ ēgayarē vā ubhayaō vā
avayāsa bhāṇabhēō vamanaṁ asuitti lōgagarihā ya
pantāvaṇaṁ ca mattē vamaṇavivajjā ya ummattē
vēviya parisāḍaṇayā pāsē va chubhejjā bhāṇabhēō vā
ēmēva ya jariyaṁmivi jarasaṅkamaṇaṁ ca uḍḍāhō
uḍḍāha kāyapaḍaṇaṁ andhē bhēō ya pāsa chuhaṇaṁ ca
taddōsī saṅkamaṇaṁ galanta bhisa bhinnadēhē ya
pāuyadurūḍhapaḍaṇaṁ baddhē pariyāva asui khiṁsā ya
karachinnāsui khiṁsā tē cciya pāyē'vi paḍaṇaṁ ca
āyaparōbhayadōsā abhikkhagahaṇaṁmi khōbhaṇa napuṁsē

lōgaduguñchā saṅkā ērisayā nūnamēē'vi ।।
gāhā-628
guvviṇi gabbhē saṅghaṭṭaṇā u uṭṭhantuvēsamāṇīē
bālāī maṁsuḍaga majjārāī virāhejjā
bhuñjantī āyamaṇē udagaṁ choṭṭīya lōgagarihā ya
ghusulantī saṁsattē karaṁmi littē bhavē rasagā
dagabīē saṅghaṭṭaṇa pīsaṇakaṇḍadala bhajjaṇē ḍahaṇaṁ
piñjanta ruñcaṇāī dinnē littē karē udagaṁ
lōṇadagaaganivatthīphalāimacchāi sajiya hatthaṁmi
pāēṇōgāhaṇayā saṅghaṭṭaṇa sēsakāēṇaṁ
khaṇamāṇī ārabhaē majjai dhōyai va siñcaē kiñci
chēyavisāraṇamāī chindai chaṭṭhē phuruphuruntē
chakkāyavaggahatthā kēī kōlāikannalaiyāī
siddhatthagapupphāṇi ya siraṁmi dinnāiṁ vajjanti
annē bhaṇanti dasasu vi ēsaṇadōsēsu natthi taggahaṇaṁ
tēna na vajjaṁ bhannai nanu gahaṇaṁ dāyagaggahaṇā
saṁsajjimaṁmi dēsē saṁsajjimadavvalittakaramattā
sañcārō ōyattaṇa ukkhippantē'vi tē cēva
sādhāraṇaṁ bahūṇaṁ tattha u dōsā jahēva anisiṭṭhē
cōriyaē gahaṇāī bhayaē suṇhāi vā dantē
pāhuḍiṭhaviyagadōsā tiriuḍḍhamahē tihā avāyāō
dhammiyamāī ṭhaviyaṁ parassa parasantiyaṁ vā'vi
anukampā paḍinīyaṭṭhayā va tē kuṇai jāṇamāṇō'vi
ēsaṇadōsē biiō kuṇai u asaḍhō ayāṇantō
bhikkhāmittē aviyālaṇā u bālēṇa dijjamāṇaṁmi
sandiṭṭhē vā gahaṇaṁ aibahuya viyālaṇē'ṇunnā
thēra pahu tharatharantē dhariē annēṇa daḍhasarīrē vā
avvattamattasaḍḍhē avimbhalē vā asāgariē
suimbhaddagadittāī daḍhaggahē vēviē jaraṁmi sivē
annadhariyaṁ tu saḍḍhō dēyandhō'nnēṇa vā dhariē
maṇḍalapasūtikuṭṭhī'sāgariē pāuyāgaē ayalē
kamabaddhē saviyārē iyarē biṭṭhē asāgariē
paṇḍaga appaḍisēvī vēlā thaṇajīvi iyara savvampi
ukkhittamanāvāē na kiñci laggaṁ ṭhavantīē
pīsantī nippiṭṭhē phāsuṁ vā dhusulaṇē asaṁsattaṁ

kattaṇi asaṅkhacuṇṇaṁ cuṇṇaṁ vā jā acokkhaliṇī ।।
gāhā-645
uvvaṭṭaṇi'saṁsattēṇa vā'vi aṭṭīllaē na ghaṭṭēi
piñjaṇapamaddaṇēsu ya pacchākammaṁ jahiṁ natthi
sēsēsu ya paḍivakkhō na sambhavai kāyagahaṇamāīsu
paḍivakkhassa abhāvē niyamā u bhavē tayaggahaṇaṁ
saccittē accittē mīsaga ummīsagaṁmi caubhaṅgō
āitiē paḍisēhō carimē bhaṅgaṁmi bhayaṇā u
jaha cēva ya sañjōgā kāyāṇaṁ heṭṭhaō ya sāharaṇē
taha cēva ya ummīsē hōi visēsō imō tattha
dāyavvamadāyavvaṁ ca dō'vi davvāiṁ dēi mīsēuṁ
ōyaṇakusuṇāīṇaṁ sāharaṇa tayaṇṇahiṁ chōḍhuṁ
tampiya sukkē sukkaṁ bhaṅgā cattāri jaha u sāharaṇō
appabahuē'vi caurō tahēva āinna'ṇāinnē
apariṇayampiya duvihaṁ davvē bhāvē ya duvihamekkekkaṁ
davvaṁmi hōi chakkaṁ bhāvaṁmi ya hōi sajjhilagā
jīvattaṁmi avigaē apariṇayaṁ pariṇayaṁ gaē jīvē
diṭṭhantō duddhadahī iya apariṇayaṁ pariṇayaṁ taṁ ca
dugamāī sāmannē jai pariṇamaī u tattha ēgassa
dēmitti na sēsāṇaṁ apariṇayaṁ bhāvaō ēyaṁ
ēgēṇa vā'vi ēsiṁ maṇaṁmi pariṇāmiyaṁ na iyarēṇaṁ
tampi hu hōi agijjhaṁ sajjhilagā sāmi sāhū vā
ghettavvamalēvakaḍaṁ lēvakaḍē mā hu pacchakammāī
na ya rasagēhipasaṅgō ia vuttē cōyagō bhaṇai
jai pacchakammadōsā havanti mā cēva bhuñjaū sayayaṁ
tavaniyamasañjamāṇaṁ cōyaga! hānī khamantassa
littanti bhāṇiūṇaṁ chammāsā hāyaē cautthaṁ tu
āyambilassa gahaṇaṁ asantharē appalēvaṁ tu
āyambilapāraṇaē chammāsa nirantaraṁ tu khaviūṇaṁ
jai na tarai chammāsē ēgadinūnaṁ taō kuṇau
ēvaṁ ekkekkadinaṁ āyambilapāraṇaṁ khavēūṇaṁ
divasē divasē giṇhau āyambilamēva nillēvaṁ
jai sē na jōgahānī sampai ēsē va hōi tō khamaō
khamaṇantarēṇa āyambilaṁ tu niyamaṁ tavaṁ kuṇai
heṭṭhāvaṇi kōlasagā sōvīragakūrabhōiṇō manuyā

jai tē'vi javenti tahā kiṁ nāma jaī na jāvinti? ।।
gāhā-662
tiya sīyaṁ samaṇāṇaṁ tiya uṇha gihīṇa tēṇa'ṇunnāyaṁ
takkāīṇaṁ gahaṇaṁ kaṭṭaramāīsu bhaiyavvaṁ
āhārauvahisejjā tinni vi uṇhā gihīṇa sīē'vi
tēṇa u jīrai tēsiṁ duhaō usiṇēṇa āhārō
ēyāiṁ ciya tinni vi jaīṇa sīyāiṁ honti gimhē vi
tēṇuvahammai aggī taō ya dōsā ajīrāī
ōyaṇa maṇḍaga sattuga kummāsārāya māsakalavaṭṭā
tūyarimasūramuggā māsā ya alēvaḍā sukkā
ubbhijjapijjakaṅgū takkollaṇasūvakañji kaḍhiyāī
ēē u appalēvā pacchākammaṁ tahiṁ bhaiyaṁ
khīra dahi jāu kaṭṭara tella ghēyaṁ phāṇiyaṁ sapiṇḍarasaṁ
iccāī bahulēvaṁ pacchākammaṁ tahiṁ niyamā
saṁsaṭṭhēyarahatthō mattō'viya davva sāvasēsiyaraṁ
ēēsu aṭṭha bhaṅgā niyamā gahaṇaṁ tu ōēsu
saccittē accittē mīsaga taha chaḍḍaṇē ya caubhaṅgō
caubhaṅgē paḍisēhō gahaṇē āṇāiṇō dōsā
usiṇassa chaḍḍaṇē dentaō va ḍajjhejjha kāyadāhō vā
sīyapaḍaṇaṁmi kāyā paḍiē mahubinduāharaṇaṁ
nāmaṁ ṭhavaṇā daviē bhāvē ghāsēsaṇā muṇēyavvā
davvē macchāharaṇaṁ bhāvaṁmi ya hōi pañcavihā
cariyaṁ va kappiyaṁ vā āharaṇaṁ duvihamēva nāyavvaṁ
atthassa sāhaṇaṭṭhā indhaṇamiva ōyaṇaṭṭhāē
aha maṁsaṁmi pahīṇē jhāyantaṁ macchiyaṁ bhaṇai macchō
kiṁ jhāyasiṁ taṁ ēvaṁ? suṇa tāva jahā ahiriō'si
tibalāgamuhummukkō tikkhuttō valayāmuhē
tisattakkhuttō jālēṇaṁ sai chinnōdaē dahē
ēyārisaṁ mamaṁ sattaṁ saḍhaṁ ghaṭṭiyaghaṭṭaṇaṁ
icchasi galēṇa ghettuṁ ahō tē ahirīyayā
bāyālīsēsaṇasaṅkaḍaṁmi gahaṇaṁmi jīva! na hu chaliō
iṇhiṁ jaha na chalijjasi bhuñjantō rāgadōsēhiṁ
ghāsēsaṇā u bhāvē hōi pasatthā tahēva apasatthā
apasatthā pañcavihā tavvivarīyā pasatthāu
davvē bhāvē sañjōaṇā u davvē duhā u bahi antō

bhikkhaṁ ciya hiṇḍantō sañjōyantaṁmi bāhiriyā ।।
gāhā-679
khīradahisūvakaṭṭaralambhē guḍasappivaḍagavāluṅkē
antō u tihā pāē lambaṇa vayaṇē vibhāsā u
saṁyōyaṇāē dōsō jō sañjōēi bhattapānaṁ tu
davvāī rasahēuṁ vāghāō tassimō hōi
sañjōyaṇā u bhāvē sañjōēūṇa tāni davvāiṁ
sañjōyai kammēṇaṁ kammēṇa bhavaṁ taō dukkhaṁ
pattē ya pauralambhē bhuttuvvariē ya sēsagamaṇaṭṭhā
diṭṭhō sañjōgō khalu ahakkamō tassimō hōi
rasahēuṁ paḍisiddhō saṁyōgō kappaē gilāṇaṭṭhā
jassa va abhattachandō suhōciō'bhāviō jō ya
battīsaṁ kira kavalā āhārō kucchipūraō bhaṇiō
purisassa mahiliyāē aṭṭhāvīsaṁ bhavē kavalā
ettō kiṇāi hīnaṁ addhaṁ addha'ddhagaṁ ca āhāraṁ
sāhussa binti dhīrā jāyāmāyaṁ ca ōmaṁ ca
pagāmaṁ ca nigāmaṁ ca jō paṇīyaṁ bhattapānamāhārē
aibahuyaṁ aibahusō pamāṇadōsō muṇēyavvō
battīsāi parēṇaṁ pagāma niccaṁ tamēva u nikāmaṁ
jaṁ puṇa galantanēhaṁ paṇīyamiti taṁ buhā benti
aibahuyaṁ aibahusō aippamāṇēṇa bhōyaṇaṁ bhottuṁ
hāejja va vāmijja va mārijja va taṁ ajīrantaṁ
bahuyātīyamaibahuṁ aibahusō tinni tinni va parēṇaṁ
taṁ ciya aippamāṇaṁ bhuñjai jaṁ vā atippantō
hiyāhārā miyāhārā appāhārā ya jē narā
na tē vijjā tigicchanti appāṇaṁ tē tigicchagā
telladahisamāōgā ahiō kharīdahikañjiyāṇaṁ ca
patthaṁ puṇa rōgaharaṁ na ya hēū hōi rōgassa
addhamasaṇassa savvañjanassa kujjā davassa dō bhāgē
vāūpaviyāraṇaṭṭhā chabbhāyaṁ ūṇayaṁ kujjā
sīō usiṇō sāhāraṇō ya kālō tihā muṇēyavvō
sāhāraṇaṁmi kālē tatthāhārē imā mattā
sīē davassa ēgō bhattē cattāri ahava dō pāṇē
usiṇē davassa donni u tinni va sēsā u bhattassa
ēgō davassa bhāgō uvaṭṭhitō bhōyaṇassa dō bhāgā

vaḍḍhanti va hāyanti va dō dō bhāgā u ekkekkē ।।
gāhā-696
tattha u taiyacautthā donni ya aṇavaṭṭhiyā bhavē bhāgā
pañcamachaṭṭhō paḍhamō biiō vi avaṭṭhiyā bhāgā
taṁ hōi saiṅgālaṁ jaṁ āhārēi mucchiō santō
taṁ puṇa hōi sadhūmaṁ jaṁ āhārēi nindantō
aṅgārattamapattaṁ jalamāṇaṁ indhaṇaṁ sadhūmaṁ tu
aṅgāratti pavuccai taṁ ciya daḍḍhaṁ gaē dhūmē
rāgaggisampalittō bhuñjantō phāsuyampi āhāraṁ
niddaḍḍhaṅgālanibhaṁ karēi caraṇindhaṇaṁ khippaṁ
dōsaggīvi jalantō appattiyadhūmadhūmiyaṁ caraṇaṁ
aṅgāramittasarisaṁ jā na havai niddahī tāva
rāgēṇa saiṅgālaṁ dōsēṇa sadhūmagaṁ muṇēyavvaṁ
chāyālīsaṁ dōsā boddhavvā bhōyaṇavihīē
āhāranti tavassī vigaiṅgālaṁ ca vigayadhūmaṁ ca
jhāṇajjhayaṇanimittaṁ ēsuvaēsō pavayaṇassa
chahiṁ kāraṇēhiṁ sādhū āhārintō vi āyarai dhammaṁ
chahiṁ cēva kāraṇēhiṁ nijjūhintō vi āyarai
vēyaṇa vēyāvaccē iriyaṭṭhāē ya sañjamaṭṭhāē
taha pāṇavattiyāē chaṭṭhaṁ puṇa dhammacintāē
natthi chuhāē sarisā viyaṇā bhuñjejja tappasamaṇaṭṭhā
chāō vēyāvaccaṁ na tarai kāuṁ aō bhuñjē
iriaṁ navi sōhēī pēhāīaṁ ca sañjamaṁ kāuṁ
chāō vā parihāyai guṇaṇuppēhāsu a asattō
ahava ṇa kujjāhāraṁ chahiṁ ṭhāṇēhiṁ sañjaē
pacchā pacchimakālaṁmi kāuṁ appakkhamaṁ khamaṁ
āyaṅkē uvasaggē titikkhayā bambhacēraguttīsu
pāṇidayā tavahēuṁ sarīravocchēyaṇaṭṭhāē
āyaṅkō jaramāī rāyāsannāyagāi uvasaggō
bambhavayapālaṇaṭṭhā pāṇidayā vāsamahiyāī
tavahēu cautthāī jāva u chammāsiō tavō hōi
chaṭṭhaṁ sarīravocchēyaṇaṭṭhayā hō aṇāhārō
sōlasa uggamadōsā sōlasa uppāyaṇāē dōsā u
dasa ēsaṇāē dōsā sañjōyaṇamāi pañcēva
ēsō āhāravihī jaha bhaṇiō savvabhāvadaṁsīhiṁ
dhammāvassagajōgā jēṇa na hāyanti taṁ kujjā
jā jayamāṇassa bhavē virāhaṇā suttavihisamaggassa
sā hōi nijjaraphalā ajjhatthavisōhijuttassa
